Her paw snaps out and she hooks her claws into his shirt. With a grunt of effort she lifts him bodily to his feet, nearly off the ground. He looks scared now, and you enjoy it. Not being an idiot, you keep it off your face. Molly starts shaking him. She starts speaking:
"Listen to me you brat," she says her voice slow and furious. You quail at it, and so does Billy, "Keane is not an 'it'. He does not have a 'place'. You got that? Now, you will never bother me, or him, again. And, most especially, you won't even HINT about eating him. Is that clear?" Billy nods furiously. Molly lets go and he falls to the ground with a thump. He falls on his butt, sending a small shockwave up to you through Molly's body. You look down at him. He is staring sullenly up at Molly. Molly turns around. Looking back, you see her lash her tail against Billy's plate, which sends it tumbling onto Billy's head. He gets covered in blood, and Molly flicks her tail across his blood-smeared snout, which leaves a streak of red on her tail. She walks slowly towards the stairs, head high, not looking back. You do look back. You se Billy get up and brush himself off. He glares at Molly and fixes you with a glare of pure hatred. Then Molly goes up the stairs.

Once in her room, Molly starts to giggle. She tries to stifle it, but it becomes full blown laughter. You look up in shock as she raises her head, laughing at the ceiling. You really can't see what's so funny. She doubles over suddenly, howling with laughter. Unfortunately for you, this launches you off her shoulder, outward and downwards. You come to a rest near her paws. The snap of the leash causes you to cry out in pain, it amplifies your other injuries. Molly stops laughing and stands straight. She picks you off her chest and holds you on her pad. She looks down in concern:
"You okay?" she asks you. You nod:
"What was so funny?" you ask her, perplexed. She wipes away a tear and replies:
"I've wanted to do that all day." She informs you, grinning widely. She starts jumping up and down in exuberance. You feel the stress on your body, you feel like you pulled a few G’s. You smile as she bounces around, knowing how she feels. Someone who was nasty to humans got what was coming to him! You share the moment with her, until the bouncing starts to get painful. You wince, and Molly notices. She bounces, lightly over to the bed and flings herself down. She grins down at you for a moment, but then she emits a small shriek and twists around. You see that her bloodstained tail has left a smear on the blanket. She curses loudly:
”Shit! Now I have to wash that!” She springs up immediately, looking alarmed. This is painful for you, but you bear it. She looks back at the blankets and looks annoyed. She groans and reaches down with her other paw. She picks up the blankets and walks towards the bathroom.

She enters the bathroom and stuffs them down the chute. She looks down the chute for a moment, giving you a good view of her snout. Then she looks down at you and you look into her liquid blue eyes. She smiles:
”I have to wash my tail, want to help?” She is looking mischievous, so you look suspiciously up at her:
”What are you up to?” you ask her. Her eyes widen, and she pretends to look hurt:
”Me? What ever do you mean? What makes you think I’m up to something?” You groan and shake your head. She just grins and moves for the sink. She puts you down, and then moves back a little. Unfortunately for you, the leash goes taught and you are dragged into the empty air (again). You bounce up against her breast before you come to a rest, twisting in the air. You twist your torso around and glare up at her:
”Did you do that on purpose?” you demand. She shakes her head:
”No, I’m sorry. It was forgetful of me. Here.” She reaches down and plucks you out of the air. She gets on her knees and puts you on the sink at eye level. You stare at her head, which is resting on the counter. She reaches up and unties you, then unties herself. She props her chin up on her paws and stares at you. You wait for her to speak, and she does:
”Keane, you sure you want to do this?” She sounds concerned. You grin and puff out your chest:
”Of course, I can take anything you give.” You boast. She grins even more mischievously:
”We’ll see.” She promises. She stands up again and you look up at her towering form. Then she turns around, and you’re looking directly at her butt, with her tail right above. She grabs the counter with her paws and lifts herself onto the counter. You quickly try to scramble out of the way, but it’s too late. Her tail swishes in for you and hits your chest. It sweeps you along, curling to get to her front. You grab hold of the gray fur and unsuccessfully try to scramble up. She ends her swish to her right, lifted in the air above the white counter. She grins down at you and your efforts to keep holding on. You start to tip downwards, about to fall, but she flicks her tail and you tumble onto her tail. You find yourself on top, and you hug the tail for all your worth. She giggles:
”Can you still take it?” She asks. You want to give up, but won’t allow it. You look up, not loosening your grip:
”Of course.{“ You gasp out, holding on for dear life. She extends you out over the sink and the bloody fur, which is closer to the tip, is directly under the faucet. She reaches over you, her arm casting a shadow on you, and turns on the faucet. Water gushes out and you get sprayed. Her tail dips from the wait, but she keeps it aloft. She turns off the water and looks down at you:
”Well, get to work.” She orders imperiously. She points towards the wet part. You grimly start to slink your way towards it. You are surrounded by her fur, which is fluffy and often obscures your view with a silvery field. Finally you reach the blood. You look down in apprehension at the red, wet stuff. You swallow nervously and twist your head. Molly looks at you, than sees your apprehension. She looks understanding and starts to reach for you. You shake your head swiftly and get started. You wring out all the fur with blood in it, twisting them in your grasp as the red stuff oozes down into the sink. You get covered in blood, but move on grimly. You start to get tired, and eventually Molly stops you:
”That’s great Keane, I can do the rest.” She reaches over and carefully picks you up.

She sets you in her lap and quickly does the rest herself. You watch her, and then notice the blood getting into her jeans. You slide off quickly, leaving a red smear. She looks down in concern:
”What is it.” You point towards her jeans. She shakes her head:
”Its okay, there going to be washed anyways. You, on the other hand, need a bath. You stink of pig!” You grimace. Molly prepares a bat and strips you. You could’ve done it yourself, but she likes it. She also washes your collar. You let her massage the soap into you, relaxed and content. Finally she lifts you out of the bubbles and peers down in concern at your naked body:
”Still hurt?” She asks. You nod wearily, too tired to think. She pulls out the tube of lotion and takes off the cap. She dries you off thoroughly, and then applies it to every inch of your body. You relax, letting the cool substance take the pain away. It does, to remarkable effect. She rubs it firmly into your skin. You nearly doze off right there, but she hops off the counter and looks down, her head cocked and her eyes puzzled:
”You ready for bed?” She asks. You nod dreamily. She grabs the leash and collar and heads into her room. She gently lays you on the pillow and you relax into the soft surface. She smiles:
”Good night Keane.” She presses her cheek into you for a moment, nuzzling you. You relax into the warm pressure. She withdraws and you intend to say goodnight to, and wait for her to come to bed. You do neither, because you nod off immediately.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Billy gets what he deserves

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You're in Molly's pad, looking up at Molly. You take in her billboard sized face; liquid blue eyes and long snout. She is grinning and laughing, and so are you, everything’s all right. Suddenly, you take note of your surroundings. You’re in her enormous kitchen, space surrounding you. Molly's laughter suddenly turns cruel, and her grin mischievous and malicious. You back away in fear, but you get to the edge. You step into space, but desperately grab onto one of her claws, which is suddenly sharp. You cry out in pain from the cuts in your hand. You look pleadingly up at Molly, but she just smirks maliciously and tips her paw. You scramble to hold on, but she flicks her claw. You fall for an eternity, looking at Molly, who recedes into a titaness, towering into the sky. With a THUD you hit. You feel instant pain and nearly black out. You remain conscious and look around. You're on a black landscape, with long holes in the ground everywhere. You realize with a shock that you're on a grill. You look up franticly and see Molly with her palm on the dial. With another malicious smile she twists the knob. You scream as flames leap up around you, burning you, searing you. It is more painful than anything you could've imagined. You are screaming, and you can see you're body browning before your very eyes. You lie on your back, the metal burning into you. All you can see is flame. You hear you sizzle in your own grease. Suddenly, a metal object is put under you and you're lifted up. You continue to scream from pain, even as you see Molly lick her chops. She flips the spatula and you fall back into that hell. Your front burns now, but for some reason you can see. You feel her press the spatula into you, forcing you into the metal. After an eternity of pain and burning, she lifts you up. She dumps you on her plate, where you lie, grease pooling outwards. You smell smoke from your own skin. Then Molly carries you to a table and sits down. She looks down at you hungrily. Except it isn't Molly, It's Billy and he's staring at you fixedly. His snout is covered in blood and his eyes have a crazed and extremely cruel look. You also see Cathleen, and looking onwards you see a long table, surrounded by Wolves, Bears and Great Cats. You hazily see some other plates with humans on them, being feasted on by the guests. You feel Billy spear you with one claw, driving into your stomach. You scream mentally in pain as he lifts you in front of his face. He smiles maliciously:
"Should've kept to your place." he tells you. He opens his mouth, revealing bloodstained, very sharp teeth. He opens wide and you see his esophagus, a black hole. You manage one little squeak he lowers you to his mouth. He sets your head between two of his teeth and bights a little on your neck. He lifts his teeth. Then he bites your head off....

You wake up, panting furiously, your naked body covered in sweat. There's a weight covering most of your body like a blanket. You hear Molly's regular breathing and relax a little. Your eyes adjust to the darkness and you see you’re under Molly’s chin, her paw covering you. She's curled up on her side again. You lay still for a moment, calming down. You immediately reject going back to sleep, so you decide to get up. You try to crawl out from under her paw, but it’s too tight. You put your palms on her pad and heave from the shoulders. It’s REALLY heavy, and you grunt with effort. You manage to get it up about six inches, enough for you to get out between her thumb and index claws. You let go with a sigh of relief. The paw settles back into its depression in the pillow. You stand up, shaky on the soft and yielding pillow. You gaze falls on Molly’s head. You’re just barely tall enough to see over her chin. She looks very peaceful in sleep, smiling a little. You go over and touch her chin for a moment. Then you remember the dream, and her malicious smile. You shudder and pull away. You look down along her body. It’s bathed in moonlight, revealing that she has scrunched the blankets up, curling them around her. It’s very untidy, and you can see her silvery fur and loose shirt in some places. You see her tail swish in sleep before lying still. You wait for a moment, than turn. You walk over towards the nightstand, trying to rid yourself of the dream, and failing. You get to the edge of the bed and look over at the nightstand. There’s a small crack between the furniture, barley more than a long step for you. You crouch some, ready to jump. Suddenly, you’re view is blocked by a large, dark object. Molly angle’s her paw and plucks you off the bed, leaving you reclining face down in her paw. Turning around, you see Molly’s eyes are open and looking at you:
”Where are you off to?” She asks you. She doesn’t wait for an answer, she uses her other paw to reach over to the lamp and click it on. You are shielded from the light, and you see her blink from it. She puts her elbow on the bed and rests the side of her head on her paw, looking at you. She waits expectantly. You swallow and speak:
”I couldn’t sleep.” You tell her. She smiles:
”That’s a little obvious, Keane. Why, did you have a bad dream?” She looks a little sleepy, her voice is muffled. You don’t want to talk about it, so you just nod and say:
”Yeah.” You decide to add a little, “It was hot, to. You’re paw was giving off heat.” Her eyes open a little more, and you see the pupils scanning your body:
”I can see that.” She tells you appreciatively. You chuckle. She looks curious, so you explain:
”Even this late you can still find time to make jokes.” You tell her. She grins:
”Any time, any place.” She informs you. Just then, you remember the dream. Her eyes had done the same thing while she was cooking you. You shudder. She looks concerned:
”What’s wrong.”
“Nothing.” You lie. She gives you a reproving stare:
”Don’t ‘nothing’ me, Keane. What’s the matter?” She demands insistently, staring at you in concern. You look away, avoiding that coaxing look:
”Really, it’s nothing.” She sighs, looking disappointed:
”Okay Keane, I guess you don’t want to talk about it. If you change your mind, you know where to find me.” She gives you one last, long look, which you don’t meet. She sighs, and then turns off the light with a click. She puts her head back down on the pillow and tilts you back onto the bed. You stumble for a moment, than look up. She’s closed her eyes and is breathing steadily, her paw back on the pillow. You remain standing for a moment, your thoughts troubled. Should you have told her? You want to be honest with her, but this would just hurt her feelings. You tell yourself that you made the right choice, but it weighs heavily on your mind and a seed of doubt remains. You thrust the issue from your mind and go back to the edge.

You jump over to the nightstand, landing heavily and nearly falling over. You straighten up and look around. You look at the dresser and the lamp, both towering over you. Having nothing better to do, you decide to look for her alarm clock. You walk in between the dresser and the lamp, trying not to think. You don’t find it, and you search harder. You don’t find anything that resembles an alarm clock, and you begin to get frustrated, Just as you’re about to give up, your feet slip on a smooth surface. You go down and your butt hits the smooth wood. You feel a little pain, which passes. You get up, rubbing the sore appendage. Looking at the offending area, you see a smooth, glass surface with dim numbers on it set into the nightstand. Obviously you’ve found the elusive alarm clock. You take a brief interest in the various buttons, all of which are twice as big as you’re hand. You can’t read any of the labels, being illiterate and in the dark, so the fascination fades and you sit down, you’re hands around your knees, staring out at her vast room. In the moonlight you note her distant dresser to your left well as the bathroom and main doors. You also see a clutter of junk and several posters to the left of the door. You gaze silently at the enormous items, gigantic even in the distance, across the sea of her silvery pink carpet. Really puts things in perspective. This view gets depressing fast, and your uncovered skin gets Goosebumps from the cold. You shiver, get up and decide to go back to bed. You jump back onto the bed. You walk back up onto the pillow and feel the cold. You consider trying to get back under her paw, but you feel a flash of dread, remembered dreams. You settle for the area in front of her nose, looking towards the night stand. You lie down and curl into a ball, letting her warm breath wash over you. You are still very cold, and you shiver and hug yourself more tightly. You drift off to sleep again, thankfully with no dreams. You wake up for a split second and think you feel a warm weight settling on you, but you fall asleep before you can confirm it.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Dreadful Nightmare

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You feel something gently shaking you. Your about to speak when you remember Molly, and everything else. It didn't take very long this time, you think. You open your eyes and are confronted by a view of Molly's large, black nose. She blows out, sending a breeze ruffling across your body. You stand up a little shakily and look around. Molly's paw had withdrawn by the time you opened your eyes. She uses it to pull the expanse of green that is her blanket off, exposing her oversized tee-shirt on her curled up body. She yawns loudly, and by reflex you look. You get a direct view of her gullet. You step back involuntarily, remembering the dream, and trip. You fall over and find yourself staring upwards at her distant ceiling. You get up again and look at Molly. She has closed her mouth and is staring at you sadly. Before you can say anything she sits up. You her stretch, then glance down at you. She still looks at you sadly, and you know why. You look away and you hear her sigh. She picks you up gently and deposits you on her nightstand. You wobble shakily, and then look at her. She gets up, towering over you, and walks over to her dresser. She grabs some clothes quickly, and then walks into the bathroom. You watch the door slam behind her, then turn towards your dresser. You open the drawers with some grunts, there a bit heavy, and grab some clothes, not really caring what you wear. The whole time your thoughts are troubled. She is obviously upset that you didn't tell her about your nightmare. She probably thinks I don't trust her, you realize. But will telling her make things better? You would only upset her more if you told her that SHE cooked you in your dream. While you’re mulling this over, you dress distractedly. It isn't until you realize that you're trying to pull underwear over your head that you shake yourself out of your reverie. You take all the clothes off and try again. Your successful this time, and find yourself dressed in a light blue shirt and some green pants. The sound of water shuts off and Molly soon walks out, dressed in a red tee shirt and some black pants. Both items are baggy and don't complement her figure at all. You feel a little guilty; it's a symptom of her sadness. She gets to you and looks down at you. She just stares and you feel a little uncomfortable. She shakes her head and reaches down. She plucks you off the nightstand and holds you loosely at pants level. She turns and starts walking off. You think something’s wrong, and after a moment you figure out what.

"Molly!" You call. She swiftly brings you to her face and asks:

"Yes Keane?" She sounds eager and there's hope in her eyes. You look away and tell her:

"You forgot the collar." You explain. If you hadn't been so dull and depressed, you might've been amazed that she'd forgotten this. Out of the corner of your eye you see the fire die in her eyes:

"Oh." she says. She walks back to the stand. She puts you down and pulls the drawer out. She grabs your collar and ties it around your neck sloppily. It's loose and uncomfortable, but you don't complain. As an afterthought she grabs the leash from a drawer and picks you up again, pocketing the leash. She goes over to her bed and drops to her knees. She reaches under her bed and pulls out her backpack. You tumble around her loosely clenched paw during this. She straightens and then walks, dragging her paws, out of the room. She walks downstairs, holding you at pants level and seemingly content to let you bounce around in her paw. You get disjointed images of her house as she walks. She reaches the kitchen and sets you down on the table. She walks over to her dad, who's making breakfast. He kisses her cheek:

"Good morning sunshine." He says. He doesn't seem to notice her depression. He hands her a plate of bacon and eggs and she walks back over to you. She sits down and starts eating. You shift from foot to foot and she notices you. She looks down at her plate, and then grabs a piece of bacon. She tears off the end with tooth marks on it and hands it to you. It's still wet with saliva, but you hardly notice. You eat mechanically, like she does. When you’re done she carries the plate to the sink. Mark looks at her: "Sorry honey, but you have to take the bus today; I've got to go to work early." He gets a grunt from Molly in response. He kisses her again, and then walks out of the kitchen, saying in passing to you: "Bye Keane." and patting you with a claw. You just watch him go. Molly comes back and picks you up again, loosely. She shoulders her backpack and walks out the door. You bounce around her paw as she walks across town to her bus sop. You're miserable the whole time. Besides being truly uncomfortable the whole time, you can't bare this silence. Molly's usually bright, playful personality is subdued and she walks slowly. The day is gray to, clouds covering the distant sky, reflecting the mood. You wrestle with yourself as she walks, hating the silence but not wanting to hurt Molly either. The deciding moment comes when she reaches the bus stop. She sits down on the curb, knees very high because of the low surface. Your grateful for the reprieve, but not for very long. She glances at you, depressed. You can't meet her eyes. She relaxes her arm, letting it fall to the curb. She releases you and you fall to the curb. You hit the pavement and feel sore for a moment, than stand up. You look at Molly. She has her elbows resting on her knees, and has her chin resting on her pads. She's staring outward, eyes distant and depressed. You can't take this any longer, you can't figure out which you hate worse, her depression or her indifference to you. You work up your courage for a few minutes and call:

"Molly." She doesn't stir for a moment, then turns her head and looks at you depressed. You gulp, her eyes are really lackluster, the blue color almost gray. You tell her: "We need to talk." She looks at you uncomprehendingly for a moment, then her eyes light up a little. She reaches for you eagerly. You shudder as her paw approaches, and she notices. She grabs you anyways, gently. She sets you on one knee; you wobble precariously on the high surface, than sit down. You take a deep breath and look at her. She’s gazing down at you expectantly, a hopeful light in her eye. You start talking: "Last night I had a nightmare, and it involved you." You see her open her mouth, horrified. She shuts it and looks at you with a determined eye.

"What happened in your nightmare?" She asks you. You answer, telling her everything, not leaving out a single detail. You see her eyes widen in horror, and tears form as you continue your tale. When you finish, telling her of Billy biting your head off, you sit there and wait. Her face goes through a multitude of details before setting on one. Anger. Who's she mad at?
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: A gray day

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You feel the hatred and built up anger come over her. You think to yourself maybe you shouldn't have told her. You know whats coming and prepare for the worst, you take a few back from her offear of what might happen. As time passes on she says nothing to she just stare into the big gray clouded sky with those tear stained eyes of hers. You feel guilty for making her mad at you. You just watch her in silence trying to figure out away to make her feel better without making her more mad at you. A short time passes before you figure out your plan of action, but you feel a little scared of what her reaction might be, you finally build up enough courage to confront her. You walk towards her and stop a few step away from her, you take a deep breath while you are doing this you see her ears flick in your direction, but she doesn't move her head towards you.

You say softly "Molly?" she is still ignores you, you still continue any ways "I don't blame you for getting mad at me."

She moves her gaze down to you and says " Do really mean that Keane or are you just saying that to make me feel better."

"Yes I really mean that Molly." you answer. You see a hint of happiness in her tear stained eyes and a little bit of a smile, she wipes some of her tears away from her eyes.

"Thanks Keane I needed that, and sorry for getting mad at you." she said calmly. You just smile up at her and she smile back at you. She starts to stand up and brushes herself off and picks you up and brings you at eye level, you see the light return to her liquid blue eyes. she burys you into her soft fur as she hugs you,you yell up to her " Molly! I can breathe!" she pulls away and lets you breathe. "Sorry Keane, I wasn"t thinking clearly again." you wave her off as you catch your breath. You hear loud sound coming towards Molly and you, you figure it is the bus. You turn around to see it stop right in front of you and Molly, she bends down and picks her backpack and start walk on the bus, you notice not alot wolfs are on today, Molly heads to the back of the bus,she sits down and set you on her lap, you think to yourself how forgiving Molly is and how kind she really towards you, you think to yourseif that you forgot where you where and when the bus stops you fall off Molly lap on to the seat with a THUD. Molly who was looking out the window turns too you with concern look in her eyes and says "Are you okay Keane?" you answer back "Yeah just lost where I was for a second." Molly picks you up and bring you to eye level.

she ask " How did you do that now?" in a curious voice and she look a little confused. You tell her what happen and starts to giggle at some points of the story, at the end of tale she has tears of laughter in her and you don' t see whats so funny a bout it at all, but you let it slide. She trys not burst out laughing she settles down and wipes the tears from her eyes and looks down at you with a grin and you grin back at her. The bus once stops suddenly and you lose your balance again but Molly puts a paw behind you preventing you from fall to the floor. "Thanks Molly." you say " Any time Keane." she answers back, "Time to go Keane." she picks you up and puts you in her paw and grabs her backpack with her other hand and gets off the bus. She heads to the school, the hallways are packed as every Molly weives are way threw the crowd you are shakened up from the rough ride in her paw, she finally gets to her locker she opens it and puts you on the top shelf while she gather her stuff she. You where you try and stand u, but are dizzy and fall down on your butt. Once the world stop spinning around you get and see Molly giggling at you, you just roll your eyes to the heavens Molly says "Sorry for the rough ride."you wave her off and answer "Its fine Molly you need to apolgize to me." she smile and says "Thanks from understanding Keane." you just smile back. The bell rings she quickly grabs her stuff and picks you up gently and slam her locker shut and heads to first class.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: forgivened

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
"Dammit!" Molly yelled, grabbing the attention of a few others on the bus. You can't help but flinch a bit due to her outburst. "Look what that little brat did to you Keane," She said calming down a little and turning her attention back to you. "Billy's got you so afraid he's giving you such terrible dreams."

She stroked you lightly and her expression changed to a softer one. "Keane, you know I'd never hurt you right? I mean, we've had our arguments but you know I care about you alot right?"

You nod to her without hesitation knowing you need to assure her. The friendship you two had certianly has had it's bumps, and you never once pictured you end up like this, but in reality you've really grown to care about her and you knew Molly would never hurt you like you dreamed she would.

"Great." Molly smiled lightly. She lifted you up to her face and nuzzled you just a short moment, despite the snickers it got her from others on the bus. "And next time just tell me what you dreamed you dummy."

"Okay Molly." You smile, glad she had taken it so well. Now things could return to normal...or as normal as things got for a human pet in this weird world of wolf people.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Things Look Up

choices: She tells you your going out with her tonight
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
The school day rolled on quietly, you were suprised at how quickly you're getting use to this routine as a pet.

On the plus side you lived a life with little responsibility, and with Molly protecting you, you don't have much to worry about besides her crazy brother.

On the minus size you didn't have much of a future on this world besides continuing going with everywhere Molly went.

It was a bit depressing. As Molly returned with you to her house and went up to her room you were still stuck in deep thought over this issue.

It was hard accepting you'd be stuck here forever before, but now it was suddenly starting to sink in. You barely noticed when Molly put you into her palms and raised you to her face.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Deep Thought

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You look into Molly's deep blue eyes and sigh. Slowly picking yourself up the words come to you in a tumble and you quickly speak them out. "Well Molly it's just," hesitating for a split second, which catches Molly's attention and she cocks her head at you, " I've beenthinking about the possibility that I will be stuck as you pet for a long time, and i simply don't know how to react."

Molly's eyes soften even more and you continue to stare into their vast blue shade. "Oh, Keane I know its hard but we'll find some way to get through this.... You do trust me right?" Her shift in tone from sypathetic to sorrow catches you off guard. Walking forward you hug here cold wet nose and speak softly, " I will always trust you Molly. You never have to ask me that."

Holding the embrace for some time, longer then any of the others as far as you can remember, you nuzzle into her nose. But soon she slowly shifts her paw away from eye level and holds you up to her shoulder. " I've got an idea, how about w go out for a walk and some fresh air?" offers Molly. "that would be fine," is all you manage to reply.

Stepping out side into the brisk evening air, with you on Molly's shoulder, she sets off into the woods surrounding her house. After a long silent walk she comes to a large ancient oak tree where she stops to take a rest under. "Tell me Keane, what do you think of me?" You're completly caught off guard by the question and search for an answer. " Well, Molly.... the truth is that..... In teams of friendship you're the only person i can trust, and in terms of ownership i could of never of had a better owner to be a pet for then you." Upon hearing there words Molly starts to sob.

Felling a sinking hear you stroke he neck fur and try to sooth her down. "Oh Keane," she mumbles in her tears, "you're the best pet and friend I've ever had. Come on lets go home its getting late." At this she picks herself up and starts to head home while you cling comfortably to her neck fur.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Speaking the Truth

choices: She sees you and is nice

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
After a good nights sleep from a long day you wake up to see a big black nose a few feet from you. "Good morning Molly." "hey keane, sleep well this time?" You nod your head vigorously and stand up and stretch. Molly looks at you with a smile on her face and her eyes brighten. "Ok, whats so intersting?" you demand. Molly gives mock-surprise " what? after all we've been through you think that I, of all people, have an idea about whats going to happen?" You shift legs and stare into those deep blue eyes. " well.... todays P.E!" her sudden change to excitment catches you off guard and you fall flat on your ass. " whats so special about P.E?" Molly takes this time to walk over and show her medals, the same ones you spotted during the weekend. "i'm one of the best runners at our school." You think over how the day might go then you shrug. " well how about we get ready befor we talk about this more?"

Molly picks you up and sets you down by your dresser then goes to hers and pulls out some clothes and enters her bathroom. You choose a white shirt and sliver-grey pants which also match your collar. You pull some of the drawrs out and climb up to where the collar is kept. Pulling it out you wait for Molly to come out. When she does she is wearing a fitness t-shirt and shorts. She looks at you holding the collar with curiosity and you hold it up, smilling as you do this. She walks over takes the collar from you and ties it snuggly around her neck. She then takes out the leash and attaches one end around her neck and the other around you.

Practicly jogging down stairs and into the kitchen, you wonder why she hasn't taken her back pack. her father is in the kitchen preparing breakfast and looks up at the two of you as you entire. "Well it seems your up and ready." Molly nods her head and Mark looks to you. "Keane becareful today, P.E. is.... diferent here then you'e used to." "Thanks for the tip Marl, but im not sure what could go wrong." Mark chuckles and serves breakfast, Ham eggs and toast. Molly takes a piece of ham and toast and gives it to you to eat as she begins to eat her meal. Once your falryly stuffed and Molly has finished breakfast she clears the table and jogs to the door. "Ok. I'm going now." "See you sweety."

To tyour surprise, Molly jogs to school. That explains why it seemed darker then usual when you woke up but you couldn't place a finger on what was up. " hey molly" "yes Keane?" she responds without turning her head or breaking pace. "you forgot your backpack." "Oh, well... you see i dont need it today because of P.E." Sitting there in on her shoulder rapped in her fur you think to yourself. " ok i give up whats so special about P.E." Molly glances at you from the corner of her eye and speaks up, " P.E. goes for the whole day."

Silently you sit there letting what she just said register. One full day of PE! This was definetly different then his school. "Keane you're preatty quiet. Whats on your mind?" You explain to her how you have PE but its only for a period and doesnt take up a full day like hers. Molly turns her head to look at you and gives a curious eye. " really? we have Wednesday and Friday where all we do is PE. On wednesday we do running, sprints, track and all that. But on Friday...." she trails off and looks ahead. "On, friday what?" " on Friday we do wrestling and thats the whole grade thats involved. We wrestle till we are the champ then the victor has to maintain status as the Alpha of the group." You shake the surprise off your face and register what she goes through every day for school. "Molly?" "yes keane?" "out of sheer curiosity how many weeks left till summer?" She registers this change of topic and figures out you're not that into Physical Education. " oh about 4 more weeks." Four weeks seemed like a ong time and you contemplate how your going to sirvive this. "keane, dont wory," Molly says this as though reading your silence, " i wont let anything happen to you. In fact thats why im bringing the leash so you dont happen to fall."

You look up ahead and the school comes into view you also note that the sun is almost up and you can hear ahigh pitched noise from up ahead. "shit! im not being late again. Hold on." At this Molly picks up speed faster then she's ever gone befor. You cling to her fur with your might and thank god for the leash and pray nothing causes you to lose your grip. Molly dashes to the front door sprints down the almost vacant halls and screathes into what looks like a gigantic gym. A teacher looks up and stare at her with dark green eyes. "Oh good Molly you made it on time for once." her deep accent with her voice makesit sound like a rumbling noise to your ears. The her gaze shifts....

Molly asks Amanda to come and visit with them
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
She glares at you intently."You seem to have a bit of food on you, dear..." You cringe and Molly, not noticing, looks down at her shirt. She replies, confused "There's nothing on my clothes, Mrs. Bee." "There on your shoulder. Let me get it for you." Mrs. Bee reaches for you; and you immediately hug Molly's neck. Registering what's going on, she quickly smacks the teacher's hand away, growling ferociously "HE is my friend!" You quickly try to calm her down; knowing it could get bad if you don't. "Molly?" "And I don't appreciate the look that one of my 'favorite teachers' is giving him!" Showing a look of utter shock of being growled at by her prized student, Mrs. Bee slowly recedes. "Very well..." Her gaze softens just a bit on you. "I'm sorry I tried to grab it fro-" "Keane" Molly forcefully interrupts. "And you owe 'him' the apology."

         The wolf is silent for a moment. "..." Molly is shaking so much that you're hugging as tight as you can just to keep your footing. Then, not wanting to further upset her best student, Mrs. Bee mutters to you "I... apologize, 'Keane'." "Apology accepted." you hastily reply, hoping to calm Molly. "Molly?" She begins heading to (what you assume to be) the track; giving her teacher one last glare. A few moments later she lets out a large sigh, and nuzzles her cheek into you. "I'm sorry about that Keane. Of all the people I know, I never would have thought..." she drifts off. "It's okay, don't apologize" You say, giving her a smile. She smiles back, but you can tell it's fake. You want to help her, but you know it must have been a hard blow; taking it from her favorite teacher like that. "Well," you pipe up "come on Molly! Let's get running; I wanna feel the wind through my hair!" Surprised by your words, Molly nods and flashes a real smile. "Thank you, Keane." You already know you're going to regret this later.

         Molly is now sprinting along a giant (to both you and her) track. She passes up many of the same students two to three times each; compared to their one or two laps. "WAAAAAAH!" You scream, hanging onto the back of her shirt for dear life. She seems to be too focused to notice you. You think to yourself that you might as well tough it out so long as she's happy. Molly glances back for a moment and smiles slyly. She knows you're only doing this for her.

         "Hey Molly!!! Keane!!!" a voice calls from behind somewhere. You try to turn your head to see who it is, but can't. "Mooooolllllyyyy!" She looks back and is greeted by a panting Amanda who is trying her best to catch up. "HI AMANDA!" you manage to yell and wonder if she can even hear from this distance. "H-Hi Keane!" she breathlessly replies. Amanda tries to yell "S-huff-slow down M-Molly!" Molly just looks back, playfully sticks out her tongue at Amanda, and somehow finds the energy to run faster. Still screaming your head off, you wonder how anyone could possibly run so fast. Especially without panting or breaking a sweat.

         A bell rings in the distance hours later, and the running is over. You're cold, hungry, and shaking uncontrollably from the whole experience. Molly asks in a overly sweet tone "You okay Keane?" You just give her a 'don't go there' look and she laughs. "I'll assume that's a negative; Hehehee~" You roll your eyes. "Yeah yeah, laugh it up." "Aw don't be like that Keane" she giggles. Amanda finally reaches the two of you. She pants and breathes heavily, trying (and failing) to get words out. "I-Idunnohow-huff-youcandothatMolly" she splutters. Molly replies "Just a natural talent I guess" with a grin. "Molly?" you ask. "Hmm? What is it?" "Remind me to introduce you to my gym coach back home!" The three of you laugh until it hurts.

Later...

choices: Just snuggle up and go to sleep
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
The two of you get home and are greeted by Molly's mother. "Hey sweetie; how was school?" "Same as always, mom." she replies. "And how was... uh- that? Did it fall off at all?" her mother said with a toothy grin that made you shudder. Molly simply walks to the sink to get some water, giving her the cold shoulder. Mrs. Wolfesbourg's smile fades. "I'm talking to you Molly." she says in a stern voice. Molly continues to ignore her while she drinks. You're also very thirsty, and hesitate to ask in front of her mother "Um, Molly? Could I have a drink too please?" "Of course~" she beams. She puts you on the pad of her paw and slowly tilts the glass for you. Her mother, now extremely irked that Molly had acknowledged you and not her, walks up to the two of you. She calmly yet angrily says "Molly; you'll answer me when I'm talking to you...!" Molly turns around and walks away. "MOLLY!" You try to get her to answer. "Molly, please" you whisper "you don't have to-" Her mother cuts in with a low growl "I don't need any help, human."

At this, Molly turns to her; you can tell she's very nervous about what she's going to do. "I-I refuse to answer you until you do three things:
Number 1. Call Keane by his name
Number 2. Speak to him nicely
N-Number 3. Acknowledge him as a person; because he's not an object"
You can feel the sweat on her paw as she says this. Her mother stares into her eyes, and the tension builds up in the room. Mark walks in the door and greets everyone. "I'm home! Got off early and... oh..." You look over to him; the other two don't seem to notice he'd come in. After minutes of awkward silence and intense staring, Mrs. W. speaks up. "Well Molly, I can see that you intend to hold me to that... I will call Keane by it's name, and if I speak to it I will be courteous" she pauses for a moment "I will not, however, accept it as a person." Mark gives Molly and you a 'that's the best you're gonna get' look and you nod; then look to Molly. "Alright, mother... thank you." The tension lifts as she takes you up to her room.

"Thanks for that..." you grin. She replies in a bit of a shaky voice "Ah don't worry about it; she was getting on my nerves again." You climb up to her maw, slipping once or twice, while she gives you a curious look. "What are you...?" You just smile again; giving her a big kiss on the nose that causes her to blush this time. She giggles and licks you off her face. "Hahaha! You're pretty cute when you blush, Molly" you say mockingly, even though you really mean it. "Oh shut up" she replies. Molly playfully tosses you around her mouth and gets you all wet once again. As she does this, you try to think of a way to poke fun without hurting her feelings. "You know, your mouth makes a great bath." you say in a mock-serious tone. She giggles "Oh really? Maybe I shouldn't bother giving you one tonight then." "Touch'e" you laugh "Could I come out now?" She opens her mouth and slides you onto her paw. You hop over to her shoulder and nuzzle her neck.

A while later, she exclaims "Oh! I almost forgot!" startling you. "What, what?" "Your gift" she remarks. You give her a puzzled expression. "Gift? What for?" "Earlier today, when you said you wanted to run and got me all psyched up." You still don't get it, and reply dumbly with "Yeah...?" She rolls her eyes at you and says "Don't you think I realized last time that you didn't like running, or that I couldn't hear you screaming your lungs out today? I know you only did that to cheer me up... it was sweet of you..." At this, you give a sheepish laugh. "Heheh... so you were paying attention to me today..." "Anyway, I thought it was such a nice gesture-" [I'd hope so,] you think. [I was shaking like a leaf when it was over.] You almost shudder. "-that I thought I'd give you a gift" she says, beaming. You really have no idea what to say. This was certainly unexpected. "Well... thank you, Molly! What is it?" She attempts to hide a mischievous grin. "...Molly? Are you planning something again?" "Weeell" she replies "not exactly." You remain silent, looking at her. "I couldn't get you anything without you knowing, so your gift is: I will do absolutely anything you want for the rest of the night. Anything, just name it." "You- you're serious?" you ask in disbelief. "Yep! So what'cha want?" she winks. You are temporarily dumbstruck at the idea of her letting you do this. She waves a paw in front of you "um, Keane?" "Huh, what?" "Did you decide yet?" You think about it for a bit, and eventually say "Bring me up to your ear, Molly" She does so. You are embarrassed to say it out loud so you whisper something in her ear. "Haha; alright naughty boy, if that's what you want" she teases. She takes off your clothes and licks you just for fun.

Molly sets you down on the bed, stands up, and walks to where you can see her whole body. "Ready Keane?" You nod without hesitation. "Okay~" She lifts up her shirt slowly to tease you. As she does you can better see the soft curves of her body, even with the fur. Once her top is off, she slides off her pants, then her panties; which she throws at you, knocking you over. "Hey" you laugh "what was that for?" She gives you a silly look "Well I wanna have some fun too" she says. You look at her then, completely undressed standing in front of you. You think she's beautiful, not caring if she's human, wolf, or anything else. She walks over to you and turns to lay down, the base of her tail just brushing you as she does. "Watch out~!" she exclaims as she lays down. "Will do" You move to the side, and are now standing at her hips. You decide not to bother to ask for help and clumsily climb up; she occasionally giggles while watching you.

You finally reach the top and hesitantly go between her legs. It's very moist, and has an odd smell that you seem to enjoy. "Hope your ready, Molly~" you say. You begin to stroke your hand gently against her clitterous, making her shudder a bit. She moans softly as you stroke more."Liking this?" you ask. Her reply is hard to understand, but you could swear you heard her purr somewhere in there. You decide to walk to her chest. As soon as you get to her belly, you trip on her fur-covered navel; getting a mouthful of fur. It tastes like mango shampoo you think. You then begin to wonder if she would have the same reaction to a tummy rub as dogs back home, so you test the theory. Molly starts to ask "What are you doi-" But finishes with a deep murr as her belly arches up. "Heheh; guess my hunch was right!" You continue to rub yourself (as you have tiny hands) against her belly until it growls. The feeling of her fur, and now the vibrating of her stomach against your shaft makes it hard to keep it in, but you don't want to be selfish so you resist.

Moments later she lifts you up and drops you onto her left breast, were you land with a bounce. "That tummy rub reeeeaaaally felt good, Keane..." she said with a content smile. "Glad you enjoyed it!" you smile back. She strokes you as you begin to rub against her nipple. "Mmmnnn Keane?" "Yeah?" Would you mind going back down there?" You just grin and reply "Not at all." Molly licks you gratefully and sets you back between her legs, where you decide to go in. It is soft and warn to your touch, and very slick. You gladly start to undulate your hips after getting about a half inch in over your head. Molly's moaning becomes more audible, and you feel her heating up around you. Not soon after, you both cum in unison, although her's shoots you back out.

After many licks, hugs, and nuzzles, you both get cleaned up and get back into bed. You look at her and say "I really loved my gift Molly; Thanks!" "My pleasure, Keane; but we still got a few hours of night left if you want to do something else" she replies, giggling. You decide to...
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: The two of you say bye to Amanda and go home

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
Still buzzing with the after glow of sex, the two of you decide to relax and snuggle for a bit. "Wow" , you utter, "What?", Molly asks. "it's just that", you stutter,"Never in all my life would I even think I would even be here." Molly is silent for a moment as if to gather her thoughts, finally she says,"Never in my life would I ever dream of having a Human." Silence can now be found in excess; the only sound you can hear now is her soft breaths filling your ears. The two of you sit their,on her bed, for a long time.
Ever since you have swept away from your home all you can do is think about it. "What am I doing here?", you ask yourself,"Has my God no love for me, so that he himself would abandon me with these creatures; what have I done to damn myself to such a fate?" Yet still silence is found,"Love me or either hate me,but do not just leave me." You sit there, in Molly's arms, for what seemed to you to be along time. resolved to answer the mystery of your entire existence here in this would in which you have been thrust upon. "why would these lupai poplui (people of the wolf or wolf people) be so harsh to humans?"you rack your brain. Just then, Molly rolls over on her side; you can't believe you didn't notice of her fall asleep, and you now found yourself being cuddle like a teddy bear.
You take a moment to laugh and yourself and you let out a long sigh; "If it were not for Molly only God knows what would have happened to you.", you think,"I do not know what lies ahead nor can I will I be able to recall far into the past, but at least there is one person who cares about me." On that note you close your eyes and fall to sleep.
