choices: Uneventful class, on with the rest of the day.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You feel the ground starting to shake and someone calling out your name. You open your eyes still heavy from sleep; to see the gleaming face of your owner, Molly, who is trying to wake you up. "Keane wake up Keane...." she calls softly, "I'm up!, I'm up!" you replay still in your dazed state. "We over slept, so hurry up and get dressed, I'm going to go take a quick shower." and with that she carries you over to her nightstand and sets you down, which is a bit disorienting for you in your current state. She quickly walks over to her dresser and picks out her clothes for the day, you figure you should probably do the same. You start to head towards your "dresser." You take a deep breath the heave the heavy drawer open, "Gotta remind to ask Molly for some more of that rub." you say to yourself as you rub your sore shoulder.

You pick out a red shirt and a pair of cargo pants. You quickly dress and wait for Molly to come out of the shower,which isn't long, you notice she is wearing a white shirt with blue jeans; her fur is still wet,"We must really be running late." You think to yourself as she walks over to you. You can't help notice her ample breast dangle in front of you as she opens the top drawer of you metal dresser which, she promptly pulls out your collar and ties it around your neck. She then extends her hand out to you and to carefully climb up. Then she quickly turns back to her bed bends down and picks up her backpack, the resulting motion causes you to land on your ass. "Sorry Keane but we really need to get going." and with that we walks out the door and stumbles down the steps. "Mom! i'm gonna need a ride to school." Molly bellows. "Molly" her mother says staring sternly at her " Why did you miss your bus?" "Sorry mom I over slept." she says with her ears flat on her head. After a few more moments of over mom staring at her, she finally says " hurry up and get something to eat we're leaving in ten." and with that she walks out of the room.

Grabs a bit of left over meat that they her family had for dinner last nice a reheats it in the microwave then, pulls out a glass and fills it with some OJ she got from the fridge. By that time her food was done cooking and she takes it out and cuts off a portion for you and sets it aside. You start to chow down on your breakfast but something seems a bit off, it feels like you are being watched by someone. You turn your head around to see Billy leaning on the door way between the kitchen and the dinning room, you see him eyeing you with pure hatred, you lock gazes then he turns around and walks in the kitchen. you don't have long to think about before Molly interrupts "Are you going to finish that?" "huh? oh no you can have it." having lost your appetite. She then eats whats left of your meal washes it down with her remaining drink; Then, with you in hand...er paw, picks up her dirty dishes in the sink and heads out the door, grabbing her backpack along the way, to her awaiting kin in the car.

The car ride is uneventful for the most part you finally reach Molly's school, Thank God for that you could feel Billy's eye on the back of your neck the whole ride which, is really unsettling. "Bye mom she says," as Molly exits the car "Goodbye dear and a good day at school, stay out of trouble!" Purposely ignoring you, and she drives off, Billy in tow. sensing your distress she asks, " is something bothering you?" "It just they way they treat me." you respond. she brings you up to face level and says "I know Keane but who cares what they think." and with that she starts to nuzzle you with her muzzle. All too soon it ends "Thanks Molly I need that." I thought you did, now lets hurry and get to class before we're late! at that you nod and she turns and starts to walk to her locker. The halls aren't as crowded as they were before due to the time you think. The two of you reach her locker and the end of the hall which, she quickly opens. Keane I'm going to need both hands here could you step on the self, with out a word you step on the the cold metal self as you watch her scramble to get her books.

You hear a faint sound of a bell accompanied by the "oh shit!" of Molly and you are quickly scoped up and whisked away to her first class, all of which is very unpleasing for you. she comes to and halt and you hear her teachers voice saying "ah so nice of you nice to join use Miss Wolfesbourg please take your seat." Molly, with you in hand walks to her seat next to Amanda ( who is looking as happy as ever to see you two.) Molly sits down and opens are hand to find a not so happy you. "I'm sorry Keane, I didn't hurt you did I?" "No I'm fine," you wave her off "A little warring would be better next time." "A little late today are we?" Amanda interjects. Molly just shrugs and gives a smile, with that Amanda then asks "So how was your guys morning?" Before either on of you could respond "Girls!" Mr. Sima says "pay attention!" and they that the girls stop talking. feeling that he has got the attention of all his students Mr. Sima goes back to writing on the black board, the girls pull out their notebooks and start to take notes. Being that chemistry really wasn't your strongest subject you decide to sit back a relax for a bit
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: The following morning

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
Chemistry goes on just like at Monday, but now it is different subject. You think that it's about some acids. Next are computers. You note to yourself that you need to learn wolfish, because you see that Molly just, well... sucks at it. You were rather good at it back on earth, so you think you might be able to help her. After all, you are her pet, and as you remember, pets were always helping their masters in some way. So you think that helping Molly in her lessons is your way to help her. And you noticed one thing today, since you were now inspecting the keyboard more precisely. You saw, that the numbers and symbols, like < > # ~, were just the same as on earth. It will make helping Molly a lot easier, because you won't need to learn alternative names of symbols and numbers.

The lesson ends and you go to the canteen. But then Molly notices that you look thoughtful and walks into empty corridor

"Keane, did something happened?"

You just now realized where you are, since you were thinking about your place in this world and didn't put attention to your surroundings.

"It's nothing Molly, just thinking"

"Yeah, I saw that. But I want to know WHAT were you thinking."

"It's just..." You consider your answer, but then decide to be honest. You don't want another "gray day" with Molly. " It's just that I'm of no use for you. When i was back on earth, every pet helped It's master in some way. And I can't help you very much. I don't know wolfish so I can't help you with computers, even helping you in geometry is hard when I can't read. It's a little depressing too."

"Keane, don't call yourself "It" and don't bother yourself with such things. It would be OK even you weren't helping me in geometry. You are the best and the most funny pet i could ever have. This is really enough. You can learn wolfish only if you want, you don't need to do it for me. You..."

You interrupt here, because you are quite hungry. "OK Molly, thanks for saying that, but can we go to eat something? I'm getting hungry and Amanda is probably waiting for us, especially for me" You both start to laugh at this, while Molly goes to the canteen.

"But i WILL talk with you about something when we get home"

You wonder what is that she prepared for you. But then you cut it off, because the only wait to know this is to wait. And yet there is another idea in your mind, since you know that that the numbers in this world are the same as in yours.

"Uh, Molly, just one small thing. Do you have any calendar? I would like to know what day it is."

"Um, i don't think that i have one, but i will buy it for you. And don't say no" She adds when she sees that you are starting to objecting.

You decide not to start an argument with her, but note to yourself to really learn wolfish to "repay" her somehow. After a short while you get to the long-awaited canteen and get some food. You see that she haven't got any ice cream or other "special food", so she won't play with you, probably because Amanda is already waiting. You are partially happy because of that, since you aren't in a mood for such games. When Molly finished getting her food, She walked away from canteen and headed to the same tree that you were at first day in school. Amanda was already waiting there.

"Hi Amanda" You both say to her.

"Hi Molly, Hi Keane. What took you so long?"

"Oh, nothing important, just a little talk." Molly says "You really can't wait to see Keane, can't you?" She adds with a wide smile.

"Molly, you know me" You all start to laugh and sit down.

You and Molly starts to eat while Amanda waits for you to end, then you start talking, mostly about what happened between Molly and her Mother. But then Amanda looks like she just remembered something important.

"Um, Molly, what are you going to do tomorrow? You know that we have wrestling on Fridays"

"Sh*t, i completely forgotten. Do you have any ideas? If not, I'll probably need to retire from it"

You burst out "Molly, you don't need to do something like this for me. I'm sure that we can do something without you retiring from lesson"

"Actually" Amanda says. "I might have some idea. Molly, you know that i always lose fast. Maybe I'll go first, and then i can take care of Keane, without you retiring?"

"I'm not sure of it. What do you think, Keane? It's mostly your decision"

"I don't see any better ideas, and we can trust Amanda. But this isn't MY choice. It's OUR choice Molly"

"You are cute Keane" She says while she pets you "So it's settled Amanda. I hope that You'll give him back" With that you all start laughing.

"Don't worry Molly. After all, he is yours pet"

You end your conversation and get back to school. You arrives just in time to take books, when the bell is ringing.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Uneventful class, on with the rest of the day.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You walk into a new class and see some older female wolf teacher. As you examine the class, you see many geometric instruments. So it is Geometry. Finally something you understand. Molly sits with you next to Amanda, like always.

"Settle down class. Get your books and open them at page 231."

You see that this won't be an easy lesson. But you examine it carefully and see, that luckily you know everything from today's lesson. Back on earth you were always a little ahead of the class and now It's paying off. You see Molly doing exercises, but like always, you see it isn't an easy task for her. You consider helping her for a while, but then you look on teacher. Maybe she doesn't looks at you, but you decide not to risk. You remember, that a lot of wolves consider humans as "It". Because of that, Molly could have problems if they find out you are so good at geometry. Luckily, Amanda was there and she helped Molly, so you didn't need to bother yourself very much.

The class ended, so you go to the next lesson. But Molly stops in empty corridor, again.

"What happened Keane? I saw that something was happening with you during geometry." She asks you. You are little surprised by that question, but you know why she asks this.

"This isn't what you think Molly. I was just thinking about helping you, but i was a little afraid of the teacher and what would happen if she find out that I'm helping you. At least Amanda was there"

"Yeah, i see your point. Anyway, lets go to our next lesson"

The next class was wolfish. You tried to listen to it and learn something, but it was quite hard. At least you finally learned a wolfish letters, so Molly won't need to repeat the first lesson.

Next was biology, but nothing interesting happened. Finally, it was the end of lessons and you were getting home.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Go on with next lessons.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You needed to get home by bus. You settled in the bus, sitting on Molly's backpack.

"So tomorrow you will spend some time with Amanda."

"Yeah. So you must be pretty good in wrestling too."

"Yes, in these fights strong legs are very important. Maybe I'm not the best, but I can fight for some time"

"Good that you don't need to retire from it."

"Thanks for this Keane." She starts petting you, but it don't last for long. "It's our stop, come on" Molly puts you on her shoulder, since she tied you to a leash while you were riding.

On the way to home Molly steps in to a small shop. You see some wolf, looking around 30 years old for you.

"Good morning"

"Hi Molly, what do you need?" You see that this wolf know Molly very good, since he used "Hi" to greet her.

"Just a calendar"

"Chose which one"

"That" She takes the one with numbers on it. Molly's aware that you still can't read wolfish. But you hope that this will soon change.

"OK, I'll ring you up. By the way, why you don't introduce me to your pet?" You were a little afraid that he will say this.

"Sorry, Keane this is Michael, Michael this is Keane" At least it was quick.

"Hi Keane. I suppose this calendar is for you." Michael speaks directly to you. He must be one of these acknowledging that humans are something more than "It". You decide to trust him.

"Hi Michael. And yes It's for me. How did you know?"

"Molly wasn't buying any calendar before. You were most possible reason of this. Have you tried saying no?

"She didn't gave me chance to refuse" After that Michael starts laughing.

"Just like Molly. Here you are, your calendar."

"Thanks Michael." But Molly have some mysterious grin on her face. "But next time, do not ignore me, OK?

"No problem Molly. Bye"

"Bye Michael"

After that, you get to home without any incidents. You notice that the house is very quiet.

"Molly, are we alone now?"

"Yes, Billy is still in school and my parents are still in work." She starts grinning. "And that's good, because i need to talk with you a little."

You are a little afraid of that. You don't know what is she planning to do. You hope you didn't do anything wrong. Molly gets to her room and puts backpack on the bed. Then she puts you on bed too, but she crouches at the side of the bed, so you are on her eye level.

"Keane, don't worry, It's nothing THAT serious." She starts laughing a little. You are relieved of that too, but not in a mood to laugh with her. "I just wanted to know something about you past live, about earth."

You are really startled by that question. You don't understand why she want to know this.It will be of no use for her.

"Can i know why Molly? Because i don't understand."

"It's just... I'm just curious. You know a lot about me and wolves. So i want to know something about you."

You think that is fair. After all, you know something about wolves, how they live, what they do in free time (maybe you just know what Molly does, but she is a wolf and she is MOLLY, your master). So you just start telling her about earth, about animals there, your world, countries. She gets very curious when you mention national languages.

"What? Can you repeat that?" She sounds like she can't believe in what she heard.

"We humans are scattered all across the earth and we are divided into countries. Each country have it's own language, but every country uses an international language, English. We speak by it now. And there are more than 200 national language. Some are similar, but still different"

"You are all humans, but use so many different languages?"

"Yes, it's weird. One of languages are easier, other harder."

"And what is your national language?"

"I don't know why you want to know this, but if you insist. It's Polish. Many think it is the one of the hardest languages."

You talk more about your family, school and friends. Remembering this all made you sad. They are all gone.

"Oh Keane." Molly notices your change. She takes you in her paw and cradles you in her lap. You don't cry, but you are close.

"I'm okay Molly." You say after a while. "Put me down, please." She does as you say.

"Maybe we won't talk about this more. Telling about this all makes you sad. Let's just go eat something." She takes you after that, and you both go to eat the dinner.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: You go home by bus.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
After the dinner you went back to Molly's room for another lesson of wolfish.

"Molly, you don't need to repeat the first lesson. I remember it well."

"You are sure Keane? Because you..." You interrupt her.

"Yes Molly, I'm sure"

"OK Keane, if you really want this".

So you began your second wolfish lesson. You find i easy to learn, if you really want this and concentrate on learning. You noticed, that these 23 bonus letters in wolfish are just sounds, that are in English too, but aren't written. With that, It isn't very hard to learn wolfish. Wolfs don't have any big or small letters. All are the same. At the end of lesson, Molly gave you her clan pen (which was quite heavy for you, but managed to hold it), and ordered you to write your name in wolfish. The only problem in writing was that this claw pencil wasn't very comfortable for you to write with. But you managed to do it. Molly looked on your work.

"Keane, It's written good. You have learned this very fast."

"Yeah, this isn't very hard if you concentrate and really want to learn it."

"OK, so we will just make a small revision tomorrow and it shouldn't be a problem for you to read wolfish."

You are relieved for that. Finally you will be able to help Molly in some way.

"Anyway, we should go sleep. Tomorrow's going to a hard day."

So you start undressing, Molly changes into her sleeping clothes, and you go sleep.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Another lesson of wolfish.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You are still asleep, where you hear some sound. You have dreamed of being back home with your family.

"Keane, wake up"

"Just 5 more minutes, mother"

After that, you hear laughing. For a while you think why your mother is laughing so loud, but then you remember where you are.

"You heard that Molly?" You open your eyes, to see Molly's face above you.

"What do you think, son?" With that she starts laughing again and lies on her back, since she can't stand still.

You stand up, a little angry on her, but it passes quickly when you observe her. Finally, she stops laughing. Molly stands up, looks at you and is about to say something, when you interrupt her.

"Please, don't say anything. Let's just get dressed." She is still smiling, but let it go.

Molly puts you next to your dresser, then goes to her dresser, picks some clothes and goes to take a shower. You look around drawer while thinking what to wear. You choose some light gray t-shirt and pants. Molly walks out from the bathroom dressed in her sport t-shirt and shorts. Today is Friday, wrestling. You have forgotten about it for a while. She gets the collar, ties it around your neck and you go down to get a breakfast. It's bacon and eggs, like always. Cold milk after the meal was very refreshing. You just wonders about one thing. Where is Molly's mother? Though you are startled, you are happy about this. You honestly don't like her very much. Molly takes you and start walking toward the doors. But she didn't tied you to your leash.

"Molly, aren't you going to tie me to leash?"

"No, I don't need to today. We are going to school by car, with my dad." So you walk out of the home, get in the car and goes to school.

After a while you get in front of school pitch. Molly gets out the car with you in her hand.

"Thanks dad"

"OK Molly. Just be careful all right?"

"I will dad. Bye!"

"Bye Molly, Bye Keane" With that he drives away.

"So now we will see if our plan works out" Molly says, but you are not sure if she says that just to herself, or to you.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: peaceful night.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You've went on the pitch. You were one of the first student to arrive, since you took car. You spotted Amanda, so you came to her to chat a little. There was still some time left to start of wrestling.

"Hi Amanda"

"Hi Molly, Hi Keane." You go and sit down under the nearest tree. Molly sets you on her knee and pets you.

"I'm nervous. What if something happens? And there will be nothing of our plan?" Amanda looks really worried as she says this.

"Don't worry. We must believe it will work out." You say to them, but you are a little nervous too. You didn't ask why you couldn't be with Molly, because you perfectly knew why. It was too dangerous to be so close to other wolves, especially when they can be "hostile" to humans. Even if you had your leash, they could easily cut it off.

"Lesson starts soon, we'd better start preparing for it" Molly says. "The only thing we can do, is to wait and see what happens. We can't "what if" all the time. We must believe that the luck is with us."

You chuckle a little at this. You have watched the "Star Wars", and this reminded you of something from the film.

"What? Did I say something funny?" Molly must have heard your chuckle.

"Not directly. I just watched a film, and there was something similar to what you said."

"I hope you will tell me later more about that film. Now we need to go." You can see her point. There is already a lot of students on the pitch.

The three of you go and take your place in a row. You see that there is a new teacher, not Mrs. Bee from running. He isn't very old, something between 30-40 years. But you can see that he is very strong. He is wrestling trainer, after all.

"All right, i see you are ready." He looks at the class. For a moment you feel his eyes on yourself, but do not look back at him. "So, who want to go first?"

You saw something that troubled you: There were a lot of wolves who wanted to go first. And you wondered, why do not everyone fights at once.

"Come here." Said the trainer, luckily pointing to Amanda. "I'll show you all what we are doing today." He used Amanda to show some moves. "Now, find someone to pair up and take your place in chosen circle. Loser walks away and find someone other to fight with. Winner just wait for another participant. You can go rest after at least 10 fights, and only for 5 minutes." This isn't what you wanted to hear. You and Molly look at each other. But just then the trainer calls: "Molly, Amanda, come to me"

You wonder what is it. You just hope that Molly and Amanda won't fight each other.

"So, Molly, you are planning to leave your pet with Amanda, don't you?" How did he knew that, you wonder.

"Um... Yes, bu..." Molly is really startled, she has some trouble in saying this all. The teacher interrupts her.

"Amanda never before wanted to go first, and this is first time I see you with this human." You notice that he doesn't say "it" on you. Maybe he don't speak to you directly or use your name, but it is still better treatment then Billy's or Molly's mother. "You probably thought that today's lesson will look a bit different."

"Yes, Mr. Timon. We thought that the loser won't fight anymore."

"I see. And I see how you treat this... what's his name?" You don't think you are able to talk to him, so you just kick Molly very lightly. Luckily, she felt that and knew what you meant.

"He is Keane."

Then Mr. Timon looked at you and spoken to you directly. "I hoped you will tell me this. Maybe i scared you a little."

You are really startled about this and don't know what to say. "Sorry, Mr. Timon, but it's hard NOT to be scared. You are all so big to me."

"I see your point. Anyway, as i was saying, i see how you treat Keane Molly. I can tell that this is very unusual. So i decided to not break your plan very much and I'll let Amanda have a free day. You Molly are too valuable to have a day free, since we have only 1 day of wrestling. I just hope that you will be better prepared on our next lesson." He starts to going away to look after other students, when he adds one last thing. "You know, you can always come and talk with me about this. We could arrange something." After that, he goes away.

"He is one of the most kind teachers to me" You say.

"He was the last of who i thought will be kind to humans." With that, you all laugh a little. "Sorry, i must go. I see someone waiting for me. Have fun Keane, Amanda."

With that, Molly handed you over to Amanda and went to a waiting wolf. You and Amanda went under the tree to sit down. You were talking mostly about school. She got very interested when she heard you are good at computers and geometry. Molly was visiting you very often, she came after every 10th battle. Time went very quick on talking, so the lesson ended very fast for you. Teacher whistled and dismissed the class. After a short while Molly came to you.

"Are you OK? Hope Amanda didn't do anything stupid." Molly asked you with a grin.

"Molly!?" Amanda pretended to be hurt. With that you all burst out laughing.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Plan works out (in some way).

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You are all still laughing, when you hear a car horn. You see, that Mark is waiting for you. Molly looks really relieved. She must be really tired. You saw what the wolves were doing. The moves showed by trainer required speed and strength. And she was training very long. You two say bye to Amanda and go to the car.

"Something happened dad? You don't usually come for me." Molly asks her dad.

"I had finished work earlier and i thought you could use some ride today." Mark ends that with a grin.

"Thanks, I'm really tired."

You get in the car, but notice something strange. Mark have some bags in the back. It wouldn't be something interesting, if not one thing that drew your attention. Some idea is forming in your mind, but need more information to be sure. After a while, you are already at home. Molly takes you to her room. You saw that the calendar is on the drawer. You haven't seen it in the morning. It showed 14, and after a while, you read that 14th of July. Luckily the months names weren't different.

"When have you put that calendar? I didn't see it in the morning." You ask her.

"Really? It's here for the whole day already."

"I haven't noticed it." But something more draws your attention: Molly has circled the next day, 15th. You think that you know whats going on, but still need to confirm it. You don't want to ask Molly about it, you think asking Mark would be better, however you want to wait until Molly will go sleep.

"You know what month is this? It's..." Molly says to you, but you interrupt her, you know what she is saying.

"Yes i know, It's July, though i had some trouble reading it." You are honest with her.

"I see. So are you ready for your final wolfish lesson? You shouldn't have some big problems in reading after today. And in writing too."

"I'm ready. Though i think my biggest problem in writing will be to have something to write. Your claw pen isn't very comfortable for me."

"I know, but we don't have anything better. Anyway, let's go with the lesson."

Today's lesson was mostly a revision, there weren't many new things. Just some irregular verbs and other similar things. Though the lesson lasted pretty long, and at the end of it was already time for dinner. But you are happy. Just a little bit practice and you won't have any problem with reading wolfish.

"So how was it Keane?" Molly asks you, she want to know how you feel.

"It wasn't very bed. I think that I just need a little bit practice and there won't be any problem in reading."

"I'm glad to hear that. Come on, let's go eat something. I'm really tired. I think i will sleep like a rock today." She's grinning at that.

She takes you and go down to the dinner. You think, that you could use this fact that she will sleep so hard. You will really need that. As you go to the dinner, You are happy to see that there is cooked meat again. It's still not time to eat raw meat. Though you think, how long It will be like this. You shake it off and just think about now. The dinner is going almost normally, but there's something strange again. Billy is really avoiding looking at you. You don't think It's because of what Molly did to him. He was too angry back then. Someone other probably told him not to anger Molly. You are almost sure of your thought, and soon you will confirm it. The dinner is over, so Molly's mum takes the dishes, Mark takes his newspaper and Molly goes to her room. Billy ended faster, so he was already in room for some time. Molly says goodnight, locks the door and goes to bathroom to wash you up. You can see that she is really tired, she don't say the word while doing everything. After the bath she rubs the pain lotion into you. You are glad for that, because you still felt some pain. She washes her teeth, then go to bed.

"Goodnight Keane."

"Goodnight Molly."

You wait for a while, until you are sure that Molly felt asleep. It was quite warm night, so Molly didn't put her paw on you. It made things easier, because you don't want to wake her up. You go and jump to the nightstand and take some clothes. You don't want to talk with Mark naked. But now you see one thing that you forgot about: It's quite a fall from bed to the ground. You see that the blankets on the edge of the bed are the closest to the ground, so you jump back on the bed and go there. After climbing down the blankets there is still some fall, however not so big fall to hurt you. You just jump down, land lightly and go to the door. Molly locked them up, but there is enough space under them for you to get trough. Molly's room isn't very far from the stairs, so it don't take long to get to them. You thank god (if there is any in this world) that the stairs are carpeted, because so many hard falls would surely hurt. When you get to the bottom (which takes some time), you look around, and see Mark at the dinner table, looking in front of him. You somehow feel he is waiting for you. You come to him and call:

"Mark?" You see that he is look in your direction, though a little to high. "I'm down here!" He spotted you.

"Keane, here you are." He takes you up and puts on the table. "I would ask what are you doing here, but it would be a stupid question, since i am waiting for you. I saw how you were looking in my car and during the dinner."

"Yeah... I'm here to ask you something." You find it hard to talk, but manage somehow. "Is it... tomorrow... Molly's birthday?" You are feeling a little embarrassed asking about something like this.

"I felt you would give me a question like that, since you probably saw a cake in the bags and how Billy was behaving during dinner." You nod at that, not feeling in need to answer with something more. "So, answering to your question... Yes, it's Molly's birthday tomorrow."

So your thoughts were true. In the morning her mother probably just went looking for a present. That cake you saw in Mark's car was Molly's birthday cake and she has circled her birthday in calendar.

"Why Molly didn't tell me?" You think that you know, but need to ask.

"She probably thought that you can't do anything for her. Or maybe you just didn't asked." You laugh at that. "By the way Keane, You surely have birthday too."

"Now when i think of it, it's just in a week, at next Saturday. Though i don't think that you could do anything for me, even if you tried, Molly's mother wouldn't be happy of that."

"I think you are right. Anyway, i think you are going to do something, am i wrong?" He asks you, knowing well that you are up to something.

"Yes, I'm going to make a little surprise for her. I just need some things and a little of help." You say. "I'll need some paper, colored or if you don't have it, some normal white paper and some colors. I could use some string, needle, tape, some pen and something heavier. Can you get that for me, please?"

"I'll see what i can do." You are glad to hear that, because you order quite many things.

After a while Mark came back with everything you ordered, even colored paper. So you have started your work. You have draw a few letters (ok, a lot of letters, enough for 3x "Happy birthday Molly" written in wolfish). Then asked Mark to cut them out. After that you took needle, string, and made 3 sets of subtitles They were quite long, for you at least. Then, with some help of Mark, you have hanged them around the dinner room You didn't want to Molly spot them instantly, so you made some "simple" mechanism. You've taped every subtitle to the ceiling, but first attached some string to the tape. The second end of that spring was attached to the heavy thing, located above some furniture, not very high, because it could damage the furniture when the weight would fall. You've made sure that the 3 strings won't hold up the weight, and added 4th string, but didn't attach it to any subtitle, just taped it to the wall.

"Mark will you cut it off when Molly will be here? It should work." This is the last thing that is need to be done.

"No problem Keane." He assures you.

"Thanks Mark this is all. I'd like to stay here though, maybe I'll think off about some present for Molly."

"If that's what you want Keane. I'll go sleep. It has been a long night." He puts you on a table and goes to bed.

You just lie down there and think about present. Making the surprise for Molly made you tired too, so you don't notice when you fall asleep.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Something's happening.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
From all that you dreamed of your birthday on earth. It's hard to tell that dreaming of something like that was pleasant in your current situation. And somewhere deep you knew, that your 15th birthday party was your last.

"KEANE!!!"

You stand up fast, feeling like something very loud woke you up. You see that's still dark around, you're not sure how long you've slept. You're just angry at yourself that you didn't get any present for Molly, when...

"KEANE! WHERE ARE YOU?!"

You know what woke you up. It was Molly. She must have discovered that you aren't in bed with her. You see some shape walking out one the rooms. The shape stretches, and then calls:

"What happened Molly?" It's Mark, much to your relieve.

You hear someone running down by stairs, Molly obviously. In the meantime Mark turns on the light, but stands close to the string. He remembers the plan. After a moment Molly stands next to her dad.

"Have you seen..." She stops when she sees you.

When she was asking Mark, she looked very scared and worried. But now? You are not sure if she's more angry, scared, sad or anything else. You think that going here alone wasn't the best idea.

"Keane!" She talks while going in your direction.

You think that she is more angry than anything else. You go back, just by habit, because you know that you have no chances in escaping someone who is like 100x bigger.

"Why you..."

You see that Mark cut off the string and one of your "surprises" landed on Molly's face. After that Mark disappeared in his room, probably to get a present.

"What's thi..." She stops, looking stunned.

She backed off a little and saw, what you prepared. Though you are not sure if she thinks that this is your work. But you notice that Mark is back with some kind of pack, obviously Molly's present. It isn't very big, probably some kind of CD or T-shirt.

"Happy birthday Molly! This is for you."

She turned around and saw the rest of your surprise. She is standing with her back facing you, so you can't see her face. You just sit down, relieved, because you were really scared. You have at least a while of rest, before Molly will remember about you. You are looking down on your knees, thinking what she will do with you.

"Keane." That scared you, especially when you hear anger in her voice. You look up at her face, but from this point of view you can't see her expression. She puts her paw next to you. You don't want to make her more angry, but hesitate a little before getting on it. She lifts you up, though not so much, you still can't see her face.

"Have you done this?" She asks you slowly. You really don't know what to answer her. You just nod your head slightly, and in a moment you find yourself cuddled in Molly's fur.

"Thank you Keane, these are my best birthday. But please, don't leave me like that again."

It's hard to talk, but you manage to say something: "Sorry Molly, won't happen again." You don't get answer, you're just still cuddled in her fur. But you are very relieved. Molly really scared you before, but you don't blame her. You understand why she was so worried. At least your plan worked out. Finally, after what seems like eternity, She gets you off her fur and holds on eye level. You see some tears in her eyes. She quickly clears them off and goes to her room. You can't see Mark, he probably just went back in room to get dressed. You can already see some sunlight.

"I scared you, didn't I?" She look guilty, you think you must cheer her up.

"Not that much Molly. I understand why you did that. I scared you first, and probably much more then you scared me." You are honest with her. You really don't like the view of sad Molly.

"Thanks Keane. And thanks for the surprise, but you really didn't..." You know what she is going to say, so you interrupt her.

"Molly, stop it. I'm your pet, and I wouldn't do anything on your birthday? Really? No, don't say anything." You see she is opening her mouth to object. "You need to bear it. No matter if you will or won't tell me, i will do things like that." Now you are really honest. You really want to repay her somehow for how much she cares about you.

"That's sweet Keane. Now that i think of it, how did you knew about my birthday? My dad told you?"

"No, i just saw, that your family was behaving quite weird yesterday, that cake in Mark's car and you circled this day in your calendar." You hope that you won't need to say this 3rd time.

"Really? I didn't notice anything. Maybe because I'm used to it. Anyway, i need to get dressed. I see that you are already ready." With that she smiles at you, and you smile back.

Molly puts you and her present on the dresser, while she is getting her clothes. Then she goes to the bathroom to get shower. You are happy along with Molly. But after a while you remember that you don't have a present for her. That makes you sad. You hear the sound of opening door, but you are too late to hide your sadness. Molly notices this.

"Keane, is something bothering you?" You know that she is aware of that.

"It's just... I don't have a present for you." You feel quite guilty, you really wanted to get something for Molly.

"Oh Keane, This surprise you did is more than enough for me." You find yourself being cuddled in her fur again.

"Thanks Molly, i needed that." You start to feel better.

"No problem Keane. Now let's go eat something."

You see that there is already morning, you can see sun trough window. Molly just walks out of her room and heads down for breakfast, with you on her shoulder.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Molly wakes up too early.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You have used to having same breakfast all the time: eggs, ham and milk. After breakfast, Molly's mum comes to her (surely not to you).

"I'm going out with Billy, help dad prepare the party." She just gets her keys and go out.

You wait on table as Molly washes the dishes. After that, she walks to you and takes you.

"Oh, I almost forgot. What was that film you were talking about yesterday? I'm curious." You just wanted to ask why.

You see that she really wants to know, so you tell her about film, "magical" force and the famous quote: "May the force be with you.".

"I see. Anyway, we need to help dad."

"We? I don't think I'll be able to help you."

"Keane, you did this surprise for me, don't you? And now you say you can't help?" Maybe you did, but...

"Practically I only planned it and wrote these inscription, but your father hanged them."

"I'm sure we will find something you could help with." After that she walks into living room and see Mark.

"Did you like your surprise, Molly? I hope you weren't too scared by Keane's disappearance."

"Yes and Yes." You're guilty that you scared her, and she sees that. "But it's OK now, i understand why you did so." She warmly smiles to you.

"Thanks Molly." That really helped you.

But then you hear a doorbell.

"It's probably your grandmother. Wait with Keane here, Molly." Then Mark goes to open the door.

You must ask Molly: "Is your grandmother... you know..." You don't want to say it out loud.

"Don't worry, she will be gentle. I think." You hope she is right. But then you hear some voice:

"I see that Cathleen finally agreed for some decorations." It probably was the voice of Molly's grandmother. And Cathleen must be Molly's mum name.

"No, she didn't know about them."

"You've made them alone?" They walk in to living room, but they're talking so don't notice you.

"No, Keane did them. I just helped him." With that, he points in your direction.

Grandmother looks in pointed direction, but don't spot you.

"It's Molly, not Keane. But-"

Then Molly joins the conversation: "This is Keane." She says while showing her paw with you.

"A human? And you don't treat him in usual way. I see that Mark taught you something." You're relieved now, she's gentle, not like Billy or a lot of wolves.

"Hi, I'm Keane." You decide to greet her, though you are a little scared.

"Don't worry, I won't hurt you. I'm Kate." You can see that she must be Mark's mother. "But we need to get to work. We will get everything ready for party. You can go get dressed or what else you need to do. Oh, I almost forgot. Here, take this." Kate gave Molly a present, some book.

Then Molly goes to her room, still with you in her paw.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Birthday party.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
Molly walks into her room, puts her present close the bed, while she herself sits on it.

"Keane, what's wrong?" She noticed that you were looking guilty.

"I'm still angry at myself that i don't have present for you."

"Keane-" You interrupt her.

"And nothing you will say will make it better. It's weird to not have a present for my owner." But then Molly starts to hold you very tight. You've made her angry.

"Keane, don't say things like this." It's starting to hurt. " You're something more than a pet for me, you're-" But you can't listen to her anymore, it hurts too much.

You think that she won't listen to you, so decide to hit her. But not very hard, just for her to felt. But unlucky for you, you've hit her weak spot (again). She immediately released you. You were relieved for a while, but then you noticed that you weren't over a bed. As you fall, you hear some sound, but don't know what is it. Probably Molly. After a while of falling, you hit some surface and everything blacks out.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

You start to wake up. Luckily, the fall didn't kill you, just rendered you unconscious. You feel that you're lying on bed. You just look at the ceiling, not knowing for how long you've been unconscious. After a while you decide to move, but then feel awful pain. You just hope you haven't broken anything. When you've rested a little, you decide to sit. You did it, and when you move your muscles, you don't fell like anything is broken, but they all really hurts. You just sit there and think of what you have done. Why did you started talking about this present again? And why you didn't just told her to let you go a little, instead of just hitting her. You think of it, when you hear sound of opening door. You look at the door, to see Molly's coming in. It's dark, probably party already ended. She turns on the light and see you sitting.

"Keane, you're alive." She's really relieved. You're not sure if you would survive if you won't fall on carpet.

You don't answer, just look at your knees, being to embarrassed to look at Molly's eyes. She comes to the bed and sits on it, though not very close to you.

"Is your paw all right?" That's all you are able to tell. You really feel bad for hitting her.

"Keane, don't worry-"

"Just tell me."You don't know if she is angry, startled or what. You don't want to look at her.

"It's OK. But what about you? I'm sorry for dropping you" You build up courage to look at her, and see that she's guilty, just like you expected.

"Molly, don't blame yourself for something i did. If i wouldn't hit you, that wouldn't happen." That's true.

"But i should know i was holding you too hard. We all do bad things sometimes."

"But I've already done that at least three times."

"Keane, you always blame yourself for everything. You're not the only one who do bad things."

"Maybe. But I'm not worthy of being your pet, if i keep hurting you in physical and emotional way." You really feel like that.

"That surprise you did showed me, that you're not my pet." Finally she understood that. You just hope you'll die fast. "You're something more than just a pet. You're even more than a friend to me."

That's something you weren't expecting. She thinks of you as a friend?

"You didn't let me end it before. I was trying to say, that you would be my best birthday present, but you're not just pet. Friends can't be presents."

You're starting to cry. She really thinks of you high, of something MORE than a friend, and you keep hurting her. She just takes you and hugs you. You don't complain. But it takes some time for you to cry out. Then she puts her paw on bed, so you can get off. But you stay on it. She's really happy of that, as she lifts you to her eye level and pets you.

"I-I don't know what to say." You're still stunned by what Molly said. "Thank you." She just kept petting you.

"Keane, don't think of yourself as a small, insignificant pet. You are something far more." You didn't answer, just let her pet you. "We'll talk about this tomorrow. Now I need some sleep."
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Another (painful) drop.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
For first time you woke up before Molly. You just sit up, with no pain, thanks to the lotion that Molly used yesterday before sleep. You just sit and think about what Molly said. You're more for her then a "pet". You could feel it before, but she needed to say this. But you just can't stop blaming yourself for lack of present. You decide not to tell her about your birthday, because she would surely do something for you. But Molly is waking up, so you can't let her see what's happening.

"Keane, you're up already?" No doubt she is surprised, it's first time when you are up before her. You just nod. "Well, let's get ready. Today will be a good day." She have some mischievous smile, She have planned something. But you can only play along.

She puts you next to your "dresser", and goes to hers, takes some clothes and goes to bathroom. You open a drawer and see, that on top there are your first clothes, in which you came to this world. It must be part of Molly's plan. You get dressed, and then comes Molly from the bathroom. She wears the pink t-shirt, exactly the same as at first day.

"Molly, what have you planned today?" You have enough of that mystery.

"You don't know?" She sounds like it was obvious. "We're going on the picnic."

"And? What so special about it?"

"We're going to the same place as week ago." She said that with a grin.

OK, now it was something special. Maybe it wasn't very long time, but there many things happened in that week. You're feeling like you came to this world at least month ago.

"Let's go for breakfast."

She puts her paw next to you. She is gentle, remembering what happened yesterday. You hope that today will be finally some normal day. You get on her paw, and you two go for breakfast. Today is sandwich, probably because Molly's mother was making them for picnic, and made some more for breakfast. You ate your sandwich, and then Molly started helping her mother. You were just sitting at the table, because you couldn’t help them. Probably even if you could, Molly’s mother wouldn’t like the idea of you helping them.

Preparations took some time. They were packing a lot of sandwiches, drinks and some other food. You’ll probably spend some time there. Finally, they’re done. Molly takes you and goes outside the house, to the car. After Molly comes her mother, then Billy, and finally Mark. Everyone get’s ready, and Mark drives away. You are sitting in Molly’s paw. You don’t talk, because of Molly’s mother. After something like half an hour, You stop. Everyone starts preparing the picnic, but Molly takes you some place away from them. You really don't know why, but somewhere deeply feel, that this will be your worst day.

"Last week we were here. You recognize this place?" She asked you.

"No, I was a little scared back then, so i haven't looked on my surroundings" You notice Molly looking a little sad."But maybe i will remember from where came, if you show me where were you sitting." You smiled to her, and she smiled back.

She put you on the ground and sit close to you. "I was sitting here that time."

You walk in direction you hope is right. You can't see much more than grass. Finally, you get to the place you think is right. But then you see some flash in the near pile of grass.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Memories.

choices: The rest of day is steady.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
That flash made you curious. You thought that you have lost something, Surely not expecting some "bigger" thing.

"Keane, something happened?"

Molly must have noticed your sudden change. You don't answer her, just keep going for that flash, when...

Oh my god.

You can't believe your own eyes. You need to pinch yourself to be sure it's not a dream. It was THAT crystal which teleported you here. You could probably get back to your family. But...

"Keane?" She's worried.

"It's that crystal which moved me here." You hear her breath catch.

"T-That's great!" She tried to sound happy, but you knew she was sad. But she cared for you so much, that she wanted not to show it.

"Molly." You say this while turning around to her. "Thank you for everything. If not you, I don't think i would live up to this moment. Maybe we had our arguments, but you were always forgiving me. But..." Molly already looks like she is about to start crying. "I hate you for one thing. I just can't leave you." She's stunned. She had really dumb expression on her face. It was hard for you to not laugh during your speech, but now you couldn't stop yourself anymore. "You should see the look on your face. Priceless."


You just kept laughing, tears were coming out of your eyes. But then you heard a growl. You stopped laughing and looked up, to see REALLY angry Molly. She probably couldn't see the crystal, so she thought you were making some really bad jokes from her. You saw her getting ready to hit you, with exposed CLAWS. She attacked you, but you ducked down hoping she won't hit you. Unlucky, one of her claws hit you in back.

"AAAAAAAAAAAARGGHHH" It really hurt. After a while, you weren't able to scream, and your vision started blurring. You have heard Mark calling: "Molly, what happened?!". Then you had one last fought before you blacked out: This was really your worst day.

---------------------------------------------

You waked up, but didn't open your eyes. You were afraid where you could be. But when you tried to move, you felt pain from your back. So you weren't dead, that's good. You opened your eyes, and saw pink ceiling. You were in Molly's room, lying on her bed. It weren't night, because it was bright in her room, but you weren't sure if it is still Sunday, or already Monday. You decide to sit, which was pretty hard because of your wound and soft bed. But you do so, and when you look down, you see, that your chest and back are wrapped with bandages.

That was really bad weekend. Maybe I shouldn't make jokes from such serious thing? I could tell her that normally. You thought to yourself. But then you heard some voices.

"It's all my fault." That is Molly's voice. Maybe she was behind door, but you could see her, guilty, mortified and sad. "I should believe him about that crystal."

"That which i crushed?" It was Mark. "Why won't you tell me what happened?"

"I should give him to Amanda, she will be alive at least." Now you are angry, but you're not sure if more on yourself for making her feel like that, or on Molly for being like that.

"Molly, you-" You decide that you need to interrupt them.

"Molly." You call, not very loud, you just couldn't. You were very tired. You have probably lost a lot of blood. But they must have heard you, because they stopped. The door opened and they walked in. Molly just stood next to door, but Mark kneeled next to the bed.

"Are you OK?" He asked you.

"Honestly? It still hurts, but it could be worse."

"Even now you are making jokes." You both chuckled lightly. "Can you tell me what happened? Molly ignores that question." So you just told him what happened, what have you found and about your "big" joke.

"I see. So you won't blame me for accidentally crushing it." It wasn't a question, so you didn't respond.

"Can you leave us alone?" You wanted to talk with Molly.

"Of course." He stood up and walked out of Molly's room.

You were alone with Molly. You could feel the tension in this room.

"Molly, sit next to me." You feel bad for ordering her like that, but you think she wouldn't listen if you ask her to. Maybe she does what you said, but she do this like some robot, automatically, not like Molly, full of life, cheerful. She doesn't look at you. So you must do something with that.

"Molly, look at me." She have done that, and you saw tears in her eyes. Her fur around the eyes was wet, too. "Molly, you really think i wouldn't come back if you would give me to Amanda?" She just kept looking at you. That really made you angry. "Molly, take a grip on yourself!!! You can't blame yourself all the time! And I'll tell you something: You're much more then a friend to me!!!" You've shouted this all, which made you fell pain from your wound. Molly saw that.

"Keane, you OK?"

"Finally you've said something. Don't you even think of giving me to Amanda." You smiled at this, and Molly smiled a little too. Finally it was the Molly you know.

"Keane, I thought I know you, but you keep surprising me. You really chosen me instead of your old life?"

"Yeah, I told you, that you're more then a friend to me. I don't think of you as my owner. And if you want to know, that part with "hate" was just a joke." You both laughed at this, though you not for long, because of the wound.

"Keane, you need to rest."

"But promise me something: That you will be the old, good Molly."

"I promise Keane." She really looks better. "But don't make jokes from such serious cases, OK?"

"I promise, Molly." You just keep smiling to each other. "By the way, who bandaged me?"

"It was me."

OK, that was something you weren't expecting.

"Mum, you've scared me" What happened when you were unconscious?

"Sorry dear, but i couldn't see any other way of getting into your talk." Then she looked at you. "You're surprised, aren't you?" You just nod too afraid and too surprised to talk. She was talking directly to YOU!. "Molly told me everything, otherwise i wouldn't help you." You aren't surprised by that. "I thought of humans as stupid things without heart. But you have showed me how wrong I was. You really like her, and try to do for her as much as you can. You're really unusual human."

"Thank you, Mrs..." You notice that you don't know her name yet.

"I'm Cathleen. We haven't been introduced yet." She said that while looking at Molly."

"Thank you, Mrs Cathleen, and sorry, but you're sure I'm alive?" You couldn't stop yourself. This is something really hard to believe in. But Molly and Cathleen just laughed at that.

"Don't worry, It was hard for me too." Molly said that while smiling to you.

"I'll leave you alone. Come down when you will be ready." With that, Molly's mother left her room.

You just looked dumbly at the place when Cathleen was standing.

"Is this some joke?"

"No. And you're not dreaming, you're not dead and any other things that will come to your mind"

"I'm glad you're back, Molly." You're really happy that everything is returning to normal (normal in this world). OK, some things are even better.

"Honestly? Me too. Thanks for that Keane, I really needed that." You just keep smiling at each other. "I bet you're hungry."

You nod, because you are hungry. You've only ate breakfast, and it was getting late. Molly lifted you up, very gently, and went down to the kitchen. You think, that it wasn't so bad day.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Really the worst day.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
Next few days were really boring. You couldn't go out with Molly because of your wound. You just rested in bed. You always woke up too late and Molly was already at school. But luckily you always had dish with some breakfast. Maybe Cathleen wasn't such friendly as Molly, but at least she kept you alive.

You haven't played "games" with Molly. You weren't in condition too. Well, not in mood too. You couldn't stop thinking of your decision of staying here. Effects of it are coming to you just now. You won't see your family anymore. You know that now there is no going back, but... And question of your birthday. Who wouldn't be sad in this situation?

You were pensive almost all time. Molly obviously noticed it. But always when she asked you, you were changing subject.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Regeneration

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
(Molly's POV)

"I guess he won't tell me." You're just standing and looking on Keane. Luckily he's asleep. "Maybe he will tell me what's going on, though i doubt this. But i really need to talk with someone."

You walk out from your room, closing door behind you. You walk down the stairs and head to the kitchen. Fortunately, your dad is still here, finishing some work.

"Dad?" You call to him.

"Molly? What happened?"

"That's what i want to know." You say while sitting down.

"What do you mean?"

"It's Keane. He's acting strangely. It looks like he's in another world, in some other place. And when i ask him what's going on, he changes the subject."

"I see. And you think I know why? You're closest to him." Mark's right. But...

"Yes, but i feel that i need to talk about this." You don't look at him. You're feeling awkward talking about Keane.

"He'll hate me for this." What is he talking about? And why is he smiling?

"Wha-"

"But I know you'll hate me more. You remember that surprise."

"Yes..." Maybe it wasn't a question, but you answered. "But what it has to do with Keane?"

"Calm down Molly and just listen to me." He tells you about that night, but omits some very important thing.

"I already practically knew about that. But what it have to do with his current behavior?"

"While he was working, I asked him a question. He answered habitually, surely not deliberately."

"And?!" You're tired of this keeping in uncertainty. "What was that question?"

"You can't guess? I asked him when are his birthday."

"......." You just dumbly look at Mark with opened maw. "BIRTHDAY??!!"

"Molly?" You move your eyes on your legs.

"Why? Why he didn't tell me?" You're close to start crying.

"And have YOU told him?"

"No, but that's different!" Now you're getting angry. "There were wolves who knew about my birthday. He's new in this world, alone. No one expect him knows his past. I didn't want to bother him. He's already doing a lot for me."

"And now you answered yourself." What? "Just exchange he with she."

Your anger comes down as you calmly think of it. It makes some sense. You're doing a lot for him. From his point even more.

"I-I think you're right. But-"

"Molly, quit it. Just tell me what are you going to do."

You wanted to say something, when...

"You won't stop, won't you?"

"Mum? Wha-"

"I think only Keane is asleep, and now Billy's too." You know what she talks about.

"Thanks. I think I'll buy tomorrow some cake. We can use mine candles. And I'll make surprise, just like he did. But..."

"And now is the problem that even Keane was aware of. Present." That really was a problem.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: A small digression.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
"Unfortunately there's no such shop. I know. I'll think of something. And i think I'll do everything alone." You think that will be best. They're not that close to Keane as you. And he done everything alone, so why you can't?

"Whatever you want. But remember that we can help you if you want."

"Thanks, but still..." You've just noticed something very important. And somehow it's a little embarrassing matter.

"What's wrong Molly?" You're glad that Keane's don't see you.

"Err... When?" From all of that your dad haven't told you WHEN are Keane's birthday.

"Saturday." Maybe he wasn't laughing, but he was very close to it.

"Can i have just one request? Could I be alone with Keane for some time? Please?" Your parents just looked at each other for a while.

"Well, we need to go for some bigger shopping and we can stop for a picnic on our way back." Good to hear that.

"Thanks."

"We're going sleep now and we advise you to do so too. There's still school tomorrow."
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Unfortunately...

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
The Friday went quick and there was almost nothing interesting to mention about. But in the evening, when almost everyone (except you of course) were asleep, you finally noticed what was happening trough the last few days.

"I need to stop self-pitying. Decision of staying here was my own, no one ordered me to do so. After all i can't change it now, no matter how hard i want. I behave like i would be dead already. And some of my mood goes to Molly. She isn't as happy or playful as she was before this incident. I don't blame her, but i don't know what she thinks. Life here isn't that bad, in fact i already got used to it." You look at sleeping Molly. "Maybe not all wolves are kind to me, But Molly does really enough. She will probably do something big if i don't change. And then it'll be hard to do something for her, heh. She's really weird wolf. She's the only one i know who really like humans not as slaves. Well, OK, I don't know many wolves. Most of them ignore me, which I'm glad of." You paused for a moment, just looking up at the ceiling. "I've got a feeling that she will do something "stupid" soon." With that you just went asleep. You didn't know how right you are.
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: Back to Keane.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
You lied in your bed, sun shining in your eyes, so you just turn around. Then you hear some voice.

"Keane, get up. It's Saturday, your big day." Why your mother won't let you sleep?

"Mum, just 5 more minutes." Bed is so soft, you just want to lie forever.

"Keane, get up." She nudged you. When your mother got so strong? And she sounds weird.

"OK, OK. I'm getting up." You straighten up and rub your eyes and open them. Just to see smiling face of the giant wolf. You back off, but the pillow is too soft and you fall on your back. But you calm down, remembering everything. But Molly isn't. She have just fallen down from the bed because she was laughing so hard.

"Yeah, very funny." But you're not angry at her. That must have been funny from her point of view. After a while, she finally calms down.

"Ouch, my stomach."

"You finally calmed down?" You had enough time to get to the edge of the bed. Molly was just lying on the floor with her paws on her stomach.

"Are you angry at me?"

"No, not really. It wasn't your fault. And you've already hurt yourself." She just smiled in response. "Though i was surprised when my mother have got so strong."

"Please, don't make jokes for some time." She managed to stand up. "Come on, we need to finally take these bandages off."

She lifts you up and takes you to the bathroom. She puts you on the sink in front of mirror, so you can see her face, and begins taking off your bandages.

"Just be honest with how it looks. No matter how bad." You knew that you're going to see it, but Molly could try hiding it.

"I'm sure it's not that-" From her expression you see that somethings wrong.

"Bad? Is it that bad?"

"You'd better see for yourself." She lifts you up close to the mirror. You turn around and...

There was no sign of wound. No scar.

"Well... That's..." You can't find words for this.

"Weird?" Molly tries to help you, but that's not good.

"Weird is me being so small."

"Keane, I told you not to make jokes for some time."

"It would be hard for me to live here if I would be a pessimist. But getting back to the point... How's that possible? Normally I should have really bad looking scar."

"Normally you wouldn't be so small."

"And who's now making jokes?" She smiled in response, like many times.

"But if you ask why... I don't know. The only idea I have is that crystal done something."

"I think we'll never know for sure. Let's just dressed." She took you to your drawer and then took her clothes and went to take a shower.

You stayed in front of your opened drawer, not knowing what to wear on this day. Now that you think about this, your mother A.K.A. Molly, mentioned something about "Big day". She probably just meant taking of these bandages, so you move your attention to the clothes again. You only have white and gray clothes. It's boring and... depressing a little to walk all times in similar clothes in such not very happy colors. But you finally decide to take some white underwear and white shirt with some comfortable gray pants. You only managed to put on underwear and pants before Molly finished and walked out from the bathroom. And she knew that something is going on, because always you were faster.

"Keane, what's wrong?"

"Nothing." You say while putting your shirt on.

"You want me to be honest, but why you can't?" Good point.

"Because you'll probably do what I say and it will cost you money." She already bought a lot for you, and you can't do much in return.

"And you said you're not pessimist."

"Well, I haven't said in in direct way."

"Please?" She's asking you so nice that you can't resist anymore.

"You'll tucker me out with your Pleases" She just smiled. She knew what works on you, beside her breasts. "It's just the clothes. I'm still walking in same colors. It's... boring."

"And depressing?"

"How did you-"

"It's same as me. I don't like to walk in same clothes all time. I'm sorry I haven't noticed it before. I'll buy you something next time we'll be in the Rickly."

"That's what I was afraid of."

"C'mon, stop being a pessimist." She sees you're trying to say something. "You are, and don't try to deny it. Maybe not all time, but in moments like this you are. Money is less important then people. Cheer up, I'm sure It'll be a great day. I'll be back in a moment." With that she went downstairs, but left door open.

Big day, great day. What's going on? And why did she left opened door?
1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.title: The big day.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
She knows? No, that's not possible. She probably wanted to do something because of how you acted for the last week.

Molly comes back after few minutes. She come close to you and puts her paws close to you, so you're standing between them.

"I'm really angry at you." She immediately traps you between her paws and walk somewhere.

You don't move because you don't want to risk another fall. But what she talking about? Why she could be angry? And where is she taking you? Well, you're sure that not far, because she stopped moving after very short time. You fell that the upper paw is moving away and...

"Happy birthday!"

You immediately straighten up and look at your surroundings. You were in the dining room. Under the ceiling you see signs, practically the same as you did, but they called "Happy birthday Keane", instead of Molly. On the table you saw chocolate cake with two already light up candles in shape of 16. So that's why she left you alone for a while. You think that you should be angry at Molly, but... you're happy. Maybe if not that little talk before you would be angry. But you're so amazed, that you can't say a word.

"I hope I haven't scared you?"

"N-no, not that much." You don't ask how she know, it's not important because it wouldn't change anything. And you feel that you know the answer.

"Sorry anyway, but I wasn't joking before. Why you haven't told me?"

"Firstly, I didn't want to bother you, and secondly, isn't it a little weird to ask or tell someone about this? And I think you talked with Mark so you already know why. And you're not angry." You smile to her because you know you're right. And she smiles back, which make you sure.

"I see you know me already. And I think you should start living here as it would be your normal life." But she quickly changes her expression to guilty and adds: "Sorry, I shouldn't say that, not today at least."

"Don't worry, I'm aware of that. And I think that nothing will spoil this day. Knowing you, you have some more surprises for me then just this rough way of telling happy birthday. And no, you haven't hurt me or anything like it." You add seeing her expression.

"I'm glad of it. But why you had to just lie in bed for so long yesterday? I couldn't go prepare this."

"I could keep doing that for longer if you want." You look at the cake. "I think I'll need help in blowing off these candles."

"On three." She said while getting closer to cake.

"One..."

"Two..."

And there was no three. You knew she's preparing something, but didn't think she'll do it before three. She blew really strong and caught you off-guard, so you fell of her paw and landed face first in your chocolate cake.

"Very funny." You say while cleaning your eyes from chocolate. But you can't finish even that, because Molly bites the piece of cake you're on. It was scary just for the beginning, but you knew Molly wouldn't eat you. She uses her tongue to clean you from the chocolate, and you've got idea how to revenge on her.

She spits you out onto her paw. You just lie there, breathing heavily and trying to keep scared look on your face.

"Keane, are you all right?" She's really worried about you, just like you wanted. But you can't stop from laughing any longer.

"You should see the look on your face." You say while bursting out with laugh.

"Oh, quit it." She tilts her paw and you land in cake face first, again.

"Just now without eating." At least she listened to you and just licked you clean.

"Thanks, but you haven't even gave me a chance to try that cake."

Within the week, Keane's leg healed nicely. Shortly after Molly finished school and to celebrate, they were going to meet with Amanda the following day at the mall. That morning was Keane's hardest as Molly insisted that they run there AND back. By the end of that day he was exhausted.

Mark welcomed Keane every day with a warm smile and a friendly conversation. He also insisted to Keane that he didn't owe him anything, but Keane was determined to pay him back somehow. After looking around, he found a small mechanic shop looking to hire a Go-For employee that could fetch what the boss needed and learn while doing so. Simply walking in and inquiring about the job, Keane found himself something to fill his Monday's, Wednesday's, and Friday's afternoons and return the favor Mark had so generously given him.

Cathleen, while not so open, was still kind and thoughtful of Keane. While she did expect him to find his own house within the year, she repeated over and over that Keane would always be able to call this house home.

Billy did everything he could to avoid Keane. If he was forced to be near him, Billy would either glare daggers at him the whole time, or simply ignore Keane altogether.

Molly, of course, was there through it all. After adjusting from having a miniature friend that she had to care for, to having a boyfriend that she could be more carefree with, she became much more open to his ideals and wants. Molly had supported Keane in getting a job to repay her father, even going so far as to help him look for one. She had been present when her mother told Keane about his welcome in their home, and had asked if she would be able to go with him. While Cathleen denied her daughter, she had agreed that once Molly had graduated and turned 18, she could leave with him. Molly also helped to keep Billy from being a bother, not that he ever tried to be.
Keane of course returned all this back to her in full. He agreed to go on runs with her, not just to build him up, but to keep Molly in top shape. Keane practiced his Wolfish, as well as many other skills so that he and Molly could interact fully. He did whatever he could to keep Molly smiling.

1342111112221121221122111121112112221121.content:
As life progressed, Keane found that this world shared many similarities as his own. These included sports, entertainment, media, fashion, and so on, but most importantly: Holidays. He first finds out by learning of, what he least expected, Halloween. Apparently, many old story's of living dead and ghoulish creatures do exist, only on an intensified scale. This brought Keane to ask about other possible holidays.

He was surprised that Cathleen, of all people, sat him down to discuss multiple days of celebration. Unfortunately, there was no substitute of Thanksgiving, but there was a Christmas type day. It was referred to as "The Day of Galvinishy's Gift".

Galvinishy was a scientist from hundreds of years ago. It was a time when scientist and other people of knowledge and power thought of themselves as better than others, going so far as to be downright cruel. Galvinishy didn't think this way. He believed that in order for science to progress and knowledge to properly be shared, every creature of sentient being must be treated with kindness and understanding. To make his point, he did something his peers frowned upon.

One day, while walking to work, Galvinishy was passing a small family of three in the dead of winter. It was a mother and what looked to be her two children. Galvinishy took pity upon the family, asking them to accompany him to his lab. After getting them out of the cold, he went to a local deli and ordered food for them all. Galvinishy insisted the family eat until they were full and strong.

At this time, a co-worker of Galvinishy came across the scene. In an uproar, he exclaimed, "Who are these peasants? Why do you waist money and time on these worthless lot?!" Galvinishy responded in kind, "These are not peasants, they are our guests! This here is our sister, and these are her children. Should we not care for them to better ourselves?" The wolf, shocked and outraged by Galvinishy's words, screamed, "They do not belong among us! They must leave!"

After hearing this, Galvinishy stood up, took the woman's hand, and led her and the children out of the building. He left with them, disappearing for days. Eventually, another of his co-workers, named Almedary, came looking for him. She found Galvinishy at his home. Almedary also found that he had been harboring the family at his house. She asked him, "Why do you keep this wolf and her pups? What can she offer you?" Galvinishy responded, "What they can offer me, I cannot say for sure. I believe that one day the children will grow to become smarter than me. I believe that, given the chance, they will contribute to the world more than I ever could."

Almedary told this to the other scientists. They were humiliated that Galvinishy would put faith before knowledge. That is, until the head scientist, Lamar, spoke out, "We must consider his words. Galvinishy has always done everything in the name of furthering science. Is it not true?" The words caused the others to fall silent.

Galvinishy not only convinced the scientists to consider other lives, his actions reached everyone. It was marked on the day he met the family, December 23, that everyone would retail the story with family, friends, and strangers as well as present them with gifts.

"Good morning billy."
~I'm going to find the one who treated the human girl like a sex slave.~ ryan thought while getting angry
While ryan was in the shower, keenan was finally up with help and walking with molly to the house.
"So how are you keenan?" mark asked while drinking his coffee
"Still surprised and I thought that it was a dream." keenan said
"It is nice to know that I can still surprise people." ryan said as he came down the stairs
"How are we going to school without causing a panic?" keenan asked
"I can cast a magic illusion around you to shrink back to your pet size and I will be the same size by my magic." ryan explained
“The only problem is that my energy will run low and I don’t want to use clones for the task.“ he added
“Ryan, can I return to my pet size?” keenan asked
“Why?“
“Because you won’t be drained from the magic illusion and you can just become the same size.“ he explained
Ryan was thinking on his response to keenan when he had an idea and he made a container appear in his hand.
“I thought that you would say that because I have some surprises for the school and there is one wolf that I want to scare.“ ryan said while clenching his fist
“Is it dork?“ molly asked
“No, it’s the one wolf with no humanity.“ ryan said darkly
“Him?” keenan said surprised
“Molly, talk to aura about the human camps and tell her about my gift to keenan.“ ryan said as he relaxed
“What is that in your hand?“ billy asked
“This is for keenan to store the magic that I used to make him his normal size.“ ryan explained
“Just hold it and concentrate.“ he added before he gave the container to him
Keenan started to think and he started to shrink down to his pet size, but ryan used a spell to make him the same size.
“It has been awhile since I was this size.” ryan said as they finished shrinking
“Don’t worry about the collar because I can get it.” he added
He snapped his fingers before the collar appeared around keenan’s neck.
“We should get going to school.” mark said
“I agree with you, mark.” Ryan added before they headed for the door
